characters: THE PROPS ARE GONE, BOTH ENGINES
THEN JONAS TURNS AND WALKS DOWN THE CENTER SPOKE
BACK IN THE DIVE CONTROL CENTER
ME YOU CAN FIX IT SO YOU LOOK LIKE
BUT THEN THE DORSAL FIN TURNS
IT ALL HAPPENS IN LESS THAN A SECOND
NOW COMES THE PART WHERE YOU TELL
THE PRESSURE VESSEL IS FAILING. WE
THE ONLY PLACE THIS SHIP IS GOING -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The silhouette of the majestic Pearl Tower tells us we ar SHANGHAI, just as day breaks. TWO BLACKED-OUT SUVs glide through a city that’s at once both ancient and modern. The CONVOY passes: The lights of Nanjing Road, shutting off with the dawn... Students practicing sunrise Tai Chi along the Huangpu riv The CONVOY continues past: Antique vendors on Dongtai Road, setting up for the day’s business... Eager chefs negotiating with seasoned fishermen for the p catch at a local fish market...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TWO SUVs cut through a morning fog that gives this br the appearance of stretching to infinity...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The JOURNEY ENDS at one of the world’s busiest ports, whe both SUVs come to a STOP, and the RED-CARPET BOARDING STA of an AUGUSTA-WESTLAND AW101 HELICOPTER - the most expens rotorcraft ever made - beckons all to board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The helicopter lifts off, leaving the port and its off-sh wind turbines behind. And heading out to sea...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tourists, angling to get the best photographs of a pod of whales, HARDLY NOTICE THE HELICOPTER as it speeds by...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And neither do the sun-worshipping beachgoers, nor the hi spirited water lovers who surf the breaks. Only a LONE BOY looks up, shielding his eyes from the sun admire the HELICOPTER as it speeds by over the lush, trop isle and heads out INTO THE VAST PACIFIC... A WOMAN’S VOICE Imagine going to the moon...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Helicopter flies low across the surface of the water. Endless blue as far as the eye can see.... A WOMAN’S VOICE But instead of it being a lifeless void, it was teeming with creatures so exotic, they boggle the mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The voice belongs to PRESCA MORRIS, an immaculately dress incredibly charismatic businesswoman. She’s speaking to h passengers for the day: EIGHT INTERNATIONAL VIPs -(whose personal fortunes come from American oil money, Mexican telecom, Brazilian Manufacturing, and Indian petrochemica MORRIS (CONT’D) Imagine exploring an alien world, whose scale dwarfs the highest of mountains, the grandest of canyons. Now imagine, instead of this being a fantasy, instead of it being a journey that would take years to complete, you could do it right here, right now. Ladies and Gentlemen, I welcome you, our first outside guests, to Mana-One.

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH THE LARGE CABIN WINDOWS
dialogues.text: The VIPs see MANA-ONE, a PLATFORM IN THE MIDDLE OF THE OC It’s industrial-looking, sits low in the water, and is li more than a wide, square landing area with docks/sub- launching arms protruding from each of its four sides.

dialogues.speaker: TEXAS VIP
dialogues.text: (disappointed, to his Wife) That's it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morris leads the VIPs across the deck, heading for the on visible structure, a BANK OF ELEVATORS, that sticks up on otherwise flat platform, like some kind of design mistake

dialogues.speaker: MRS. TEXAS VIP
dialogues.text: (to Morris) Obviously, when you get closer to completion, you’re gonna do this up, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling) No. No? Did they hear that right? The ELEVATOR door opens, an if the VIPs thought that the platform was disappointing..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Then the ELEVATOR takes that to another level. It’s a massive freight lift - the kind you’d find in a garment warehouse. The only clue that there is something more goi on here is that Morris is holding out STICKS OF--

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Chewing gum, anyone? For your ears. I recommend it. The first time down can be a bit much. And so this group of people, collectively worth 1/4 of a TRILLION DOLLARS, take sticks of 99-cent chewing gum.

dialogues.speaker: TEXAS VIP
dialogues.text: Are we on candid camera or something? Morris selects the “0” floor, using an old-fashion hand-c selector. DOWN they go. Fast.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Your ears are popping because, even though the station is normalized, pressure changes underwater are much greater than they are in the air. A Scuba diver, rising from the depth we're going to, would have to spend hours in a decompression tank or die a painful death. Then again, no scuba diver has ever been as deep as you're about to be. They reach the O-level. The elevator stops with a LURCH.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Your gum? Morris holds out a CHEAP PLASTIC CONTAINER for those who to get rid of their gum. That’s the last straw for TEXAS.

dialogues.speaker: TEXAS VIP
dialogues.text: I’ve got to be honest with you, Ms. Morris. So far I find this whole thing profoundly underwhelming--  4. --as if on cue the ELEVATOR DOORS OPEN to reveal A HUMPBA WHALE gliding gracefully by right in front of them. ITS S fills the elevator as A SECOND HUMPBACK, a BABY, slides b

dialogues.speaker: MINWAY ZHANG, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Then it’s a good thing it’s not the elevator you’re here to see. DR. MINWAY ZHANG - 60s, but brimming with the enthusiasm child, has been waiting for them here on the--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An all-glass world - shaped like a massive horizontal bic wheel. Its six “spokes” are corridors, and its “rim” is m than 1/4 mile around in its entirety. The result is a vie of sea life in every direction. A 360 degree aquarium cal the Pacific Ocean.

dialogues.speaker: MINWAY ZHANG
dialogues.text: You are looking at something few people have ever seen. Life 1,000 feet beneath the surface... Standing next to Zhang, his granddaughter MEIYING, 8, see to take delight in watching the VIPs’ jaws drop.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: On behalf of my granddaughter, Meiying, I welcome you to the Observation Level. A structure designed with the knowledge that nothing man makes will ever compete with the majesty of the sea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We WALK with the group as Zhang leads them around a porti of the O-Level. Pausing to point out certain species of s life as they make appearances outside the glass.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Mana-one’s location, on the edge of a tectonic shelf, means we get an incredible variety of aquatic life. From something as common as the Bluefin Tuna... (two 800-lbs glide by) ...to something as rare and spectacular as... .--He nods for Meiying to identify what she sees outside:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (excited) An oarfish! Gasps are heard as the VIPs see AN OARFISH: a 35-ft long silvery ribbon of life with a dragon’s head.

dialogues.speaker: INDIAN VIP
dialogues.text: This is incredible, Dr. Zhang.

dialogues.speaker: BRAZILIAN VIP
dialogues.text: Truly spectacular.

dialogues.speaker: TEXAS VIP
dialogues.text: How long ‘til you open up to paying customers? Zhang looks to Morris. Those details are her department.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Ten months. In addition to this level, we're building a restaurant we think has the world’s greatest view, a hospital-quality infirmary, and most importantly, a gift shop. That gets laughs.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: For years, I’ve traveled the world, urging people to take better care of the sea. My hope is now, by bringing the world here, the sea will speak for itself. There is some spontaneous applause for the achievement.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: (Prompting Zhang) So, it’s no accident we invited you all here today...

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: ...Yes. As you may remember, Mana- One is built where it is to give us access to the deepest reaches of our planet. The Marianas Trench. Nearly seven miles below the surface at its base, the mysteries of the trench hold the keys to a better understanding of the world in which we live. And yet it remains a place mankind has seen less of than the planet Mars. Our (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: mission is to change that. Right now, as I speak to you, a team of our submersibles, including one piloted by my daughter, is putting the last of our UNIS BOT sensor stations in place, 30,000 feet below us. When powered up, these BOTS will send back images, the likes of which no one has seen before. And we want you, our angel investors, to be with us when we turn them on for the first time. Now everyone is really jazzed. TEXAS VIP looks at Morris.

dialogues.speaker: TEXAS VIP
dialogues.text: Well played, little lady. Well played.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zhang, Morris, Meiying and the VIPs emerge from the eleva and find themselves in a Mission-Control like space, know the DIVE CONTROL CENTER (DCC). A small TEAM OF PERSONNEL (who we'll get to know) is monitoring every aspect of the current mission into the trench. A dazzling array of vide screens shows us everything from the CREW MEMBERS’ VITAL SIGNS, to IMAGES FROM INSIDE THE SUBS, and of course, IMA OF WHAT’S OUTSIDE THE SUBS. A TACTICAL DISPLAY shows a computer representation of the dive going on right now. Two sleek ABYSS GLIDERS (Fastbac and Fastback 2) are orbiting at 20,000 feet down, acting sonar eyes in the sky for the two MULE SUBS (Angel 1 and Angel 2) that are actually in the trench placing the last the UNIS BOTS into position. The DIVE OPERATIONS CHIEF, James “MAC” Mackriedes, 30s, r around the edges, nods ‘hello’ to the VIPs and then resum what he’s doing. JAMES “MAC” MACKRIEDES (into a mic) Angel one, have you got that last bot in position? ANGEL ONE, the first of the Mules, is captained by JUNJIE Chen and co-piloted by CARL Sheppherd. We see their cockp on a screen. There’s a delay between the video and audio:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Standby... Bot is down. Footpad indicator. four greens. Inertial Power Unit: on. Tether: released.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TACTICAL DISPLAY shows ANGEL ONE is no longer tethere its UNIS BOT cargo. And that the BOT is well-positioned i the trench. This gets the room excited.

dialogues.speaker: JUNJIE/ANGEL ONE, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Well everyone, it looks like we owe Dimitri an apology. His stuff might actually work. He’s referring to DIMITRI Karmanov, the handsome, blue-ey Russian Engineer who is watching the dive from a seat nex Mac. Mac pats Dimitri on the back. Dimitri is emotionless

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Fan, let’s go ahead and ping the BOTS so we can start them up. This to Linfan “FAN” Chang, 24, a marine biologist whose are covered in decorative tattoos of mermaids and sea creatures. Fan is Meiying’s favorite team member, (beside her mom and grandpa), so it’s no surprise that Meiying ha joined her at the control panel. Fan enters a series of commands on her keyboard.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Wake-up boys... Give us a smile...

dialogues.speaker: ON TACTICAL
dialogues.text: One by one, the two dozen BOTS, which have been placed in tandem along a length of the trench, BEGIN TO BLINK.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: All Bots responding. Initial readings - nominal. Ready for power-up on your command. Fan looks at Mac, but then Mac, and everyone, looks at ZH This moment is the culmination of years of hard work.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Go ahead, please. Dimitri and Fan rapidly execute a series of keystrokes - reach the final button-push. Fan turns to MEIYING. Let’s push this last button together. As they do, Fan says...

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Let there be light.  A SERIES OF QUICK CUTS BETWEEN POVS. 1) From Junjie’s and Francois’s MULES (Angel One and Two) hovering in the trench. They stare into the darkness - bu see NOTHING yet. 2) From an ABYSS GLIDER (Fastback One) orbiting above, piloted by SUYIN Zhang -- late 20s, beautiful and brillia Suyin looks down out the bottom of her glass cockpit. She sees the faint blinking position lights of the two Mules below... But NOTHING else.

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE DIVE CONTROL CENTER
dialogues.text: THE TACTICAL DISPLAY shows all BOTS turning from Red to Green, meaning they should be on... But...

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: No visuals from BOT cameras. No data either. Is it possible something isn’t working? Mac looks at Dimitri. Dimitri stares, it will be fine.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: (nervous, into the mic) Angel One, do you have a visual? (static) Junjie, I say again, do you have a visual? (static) Suyin, can you see anything from up where you are? Silence. It’s horrible. Mac is about to speak again when-

dialogues.speaker: JUNJIE/ANGEL ONE, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: --Mana-One, confirmed. The BOTS are working... JUNJIE’S POV In the inky black reaches just below him, he now sees a series of BRIGHT WHITE LIGHTS - orbs in the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: JUNJIE/ANGEL ONE
dialogues.text: Not sure our cameras will do them justice. From here it looks like someone dropped the two most beautiful diamond necklaces you ever saw.  SUYIN’S POV From up here, it almost looks like an airport runway at night. Suyin breaks into a big smile.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Congratulations, father. You did it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Applause breaks out. Zhang, beaming...

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: We did it. All of us.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: And we have visuals. Welcome, everyone, to the most exotic place on planet Earth... The VISUALS begin to explode onto the DCC SCREENS. This i the Marianas Trench as we have never seen it. CORAL TOWER reach skyward like church spires. ACTIVE VOLCANOES spew plumes of deadly sulfur. And STRANGE, ALIEN CREATURES hau the waters. Bleach white cephalopods, invertebrates. Then --A SCREAM FROM ONE OF THE VIPs WHEN an ANGLER FISH appea on screen, like something out of a nightmare! That gives everyone a good scare. Then more LAUGHS.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Have no fear. That Angler Fish is only 6 inches long. And it’s six miles beneath us. There’s a MOMENT where everyone just marvels at what they see. Is that a tear in ZHANG’S eye? MAC and HELLER embrac FAN reaches out and surreptitiously SQUEEZES DIMITRI’S HA a secret romance between the fiery gal and icy Russian. PING... Amidst the celebratory laughs, a lone SONAR PING. And then another... PING...

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Fastbacks One and Two. You guys see that?  10.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin looks around. Her glass cockpit has a HEADS-UP DISP projected on it. And sure enough it is picking up SOMETHI moving fast, north to south, high to low, in the TRENCH. sub’s computer puts a little box around the ‘target’ even though it can’t actually be seen.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Copy that, Mana-One. I have one... Make that two targets... More BOXES appear... Indicating more targets... But then some disappear and re-appear... It’s really weird.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: DJ, you picking this up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “DJ" LAU, late 20s, a guy who exudes ‘cool’ in every way. flips a quarter through the fingers of his left hand, whi piloting his ship with his right.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: My sonar’s lighting up like a Vegas casino. It’s got to be electrical interference.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin can think of one OTHER possibility.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Angels one and two - suggest ascend 500 meters - there might be a rock slide heading your way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rock slide? The smile from Mac’s face vanishes.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Our sonar’s picking up nothing. And there’s no indication of seismic activity.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: (looks at Mac) You worry too much. It’s interference, nothing more-- Suddenly -- SMASH -- THERE IS A BLACK SQUARE where one of BOT CAMERAS’ FEED used to be as the SIGNAL GOES OUT. Then  11. SECOND BOT CAMERA goes black. We see that Angler Fish suddenly dart away and then THAT CAMERA TOO GOES BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Piloted by FRANCOIS Bernard and his brother, LUC. They ar in a hovering orbit, with Junjie’s Mule “Angel One” visib not too far off their starboard side. They watch as - one by one - THE BOTS vanish into blackne

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Mana, Angel Two. We've lost visual on the Bots. All of them.

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE DIVE CONTROL CENTER
dialogues.text: Zhang confers with Mac. Fan and Dimitri pour over some da Nothing dramatic has happened up here, but the discussion among the staff is enough to make some people wonder:

dialogues.speaker: INDIAN VIP
dialogues.text: (to Morris) Is everything okay? Mac catches wind of that question. Adjusts his tie and screws on the charm.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Everything is fine. The test went perfectly. I’ve asked Dimitri to power down the Bots so we could re- position them. Our placement was good, but you know Dr. Zhang, it has to be perfect, so... Morris, reading Mac, has already called for the Elevator. She jumps in--

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: (to the VIPs) --So we just want to say thank you, again, for making the trip to be a part of history. Before we take you back to Shanghai, we do still have one very important thing we have to do -- raid that gift shop so no one goes home empty handed. The VIPs step in the ELEVATOR, the door CLOSES, they’re G

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Thank God the dog and pony show is over because I haven’t cursed in (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: twenty minutes and I’m starting to worry about what might come out of my mouth. Talk to me, people. Mac approaches Dimitri, who is hovering over Fan, both watching the computer systems reboot. As Mac arrives he “loosens” his tie. Except Mac’s wearing a clip-on tie - so it comes right off. Fan’s attention turns from the comput screen to Mac’s absurd accessory.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: It’s like you just pulled a unicorn off your shirt. I'd heard of clip- on ties, but thought they were an urban legend--

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: You think my tie is the reason we're staring at a wall of blank monitors!?

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Honestly, I’m not prepared to rule it out.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: (has the real answer) The BOTS have been knocked off their moorings. Suyin was right. It must have been a landslide.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Are you saying we have to put all the BOTS back in position? Dimitri nods. That’s a lot of work. Mac turns to Zhang.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Maybe we should bring everyone up, start fresh in the morning.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: Sure, the BOTS are only 100 million euros a-piece. Let’s leave them unfastened at the bottom of the trench - what could go wrong? Mac doesn’t appreciate the sarcasm. But Zhang agrees with Dimitri. As does Fan. As does Mac, when he thinks about it.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Good news, gang. You’re going to earn some overtime...  13. ZHANG crosses to HELLER at the MEDICAL MONITORING STATION They can see the divers’ heart rates, body temperature, e

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Dr. Heller, will it be safe for them to stay down there that long?

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: They're fine. Vitals are normal. (tries to lighten things) Junjie’s so relaxed, he might actually be asleep. Zhang smiles. He needed that. He looks over at Meiying.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Come on, sweetie, I’1l take you back to your room. Mommy's going to be down there a while longer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Junjie puts his Mule into a descent.

dialogues.speaker: JUNJIE/ANGEL ONE
dialogues.text: Angel one. Heading back down. Try not to crash into me, Francois. I saw that bottle of Merlot you smuggled on board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois puts his Mule into a descent.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS/ANGEL TWO
dialogues.text: Angel One, I take offense to that. No Frenchman would risk a dive for a Merlot. Now a good Bordeaux on the other hand...

dialogues.speaker: TRENCH
dialogues.text: We watch as the TWO MULES plunge into darkness. All is qu and peaceful UNTIL -- SOME FAST MOVING MASSIVE SHAPE -- glides across the FRAME and we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Visual and Data feeds from all four subs are BREAKING UP Pictures go FUZZY... Voices sound computer DISTORTED...  14.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Angels One and Two, status?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois and Luc’s POV as they close in on a Bot. Their search and flood lights illuminating a cone of darkness.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Coming up on a Bot. Looks like it was knocked over.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Angel 2, was it a landslide?

dialogues.speaker: MEANWHILE
dialogues.text: Suyin fights to steady her Abyss Glider against the curre

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: DJ, current’s picking up. I’m firing starboard anchor. She flips a switch and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ANCHOR shoots out of the right wing-top of Suyin’s Aby Glider and lodges in the side of the vertical cliff face. Then WHOOSH -- another anchor goes by and burrows into th solid face -- revealing DJ'S Glider has done the same thi BELOW -- we can see the lights of Angel One and Two. Then SOMETHING PASSES OVER THEM - momentarily obscuring our vi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JUNJIE approaches a Bot. You can BARELY SEE ANYTHING arou him. The intense depth causes the HULL TO MOAN AND POP.

dialogues.speaker: JUNJIE
dialogues.text: Through 11,000 meters. It’s pea soup down here guys. Something really stirred the sediment up.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Guys, this BOT is completely caved in. A bead of sweat rolls down Junjie’s forehead, as his sub anxiously creeps forward inches at a time. Finally, throu the haze of sand, the BOT COMES INTO VIEW.  15.

dialogues.speaker: JUNJIE
dialogues.text: That’s impossible... JUNJIE'S POV OF THE BOT -- It’s completely torn apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heller notices Junjie and Carl’s Heart rates begin to RIS

dialogues.speaker: JUNJIE, (RADIO - STATIC)
dialogues.text: -..-looks like a bomb... We’re... through the wreckage.... Clues. Mac turns to Zhang. He’s got a bad feeling about this.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Dr. Zhang, I suggest we get our people out of there, go back down with an unmanned sub...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Junjie carefully guides his sub over the debris field. WE/THEY can only see inches at a time. Carl points to something that isn’t metallic grey in the wreckage. It’s a WHITE TRIANGULAR OBJECT, which is partially broken that is now embedded in the side of the UNIS BOT.

dialogues.speaker: JUNJIE
dialogues.text: There’s something in the bot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mac continues his plea.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: When I hear talk of an explosion--

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: There is nothing explosive down there.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: --I don’t think Junjie is making it up, do you? Something happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MYSTERIOUS OBJECT becomes more clear... There isn’t j ONE TRIANGLE. There are four, five, six...

dialogues.speaker: JUNJIE
dialogues.text: Oh my God...  16. Junjie and Carl are transfixed by a row of GIANT TEETH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heller sees the HEART RATES of Junjie and Carl jump.

dialogues.speaker: HELLER, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Junjie, I’m seeing major spikes for you and Carl - are you okay? They get no immediate answer - so Mac makes a decision.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (MIC)
dialogues.text: This is Mana-One - code BUSTER. All vehicles commence ascent now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin realizes the Mules can’t hear Mac. She relays:

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Angels one and two, code Buster. We're getting out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carl and Junjie - transfixed by the sight of the teeth.

dialogues.speaker: CARL
dialogues.text: Yeah. I think that’s a swell idea-- --In_less than a tenth of a second, SOMETHING hits Angel with the force of a FREIGHT TRAIN. The sub IMPLODES, kill Junjie and Carl instantly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And sending flat lines to Heller's readings.

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: I’ve lost them!

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: (looking on tactical) So have I... Mac's radio calls to Angel One play over:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois and Luc are rising from the trench when suddenly sees a SHADOW approaching and WHAM--  17.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --Contact with Francois and Luc is lost. The DCC is in ch

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin can hear Mac’s frantic radio calls for Angels One a Two. She’s getting very worried now.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Angel One this is Fastback, over. Junjie, talk to me. Angel Two... Then... PING - PING. Suyin’s sonar begins to identify MULTIPLE TARGETS COMING UP AT HER FROM BELOW.

dialogues.speaker: DJ, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Suyin, I’ve got multiple targets, directly below and rising fast.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Angel One, Angel Two, come in...

dialogues.speaker: DJ, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Suyin, do you hear me? We’ve got to get out of here. Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PING - PING - PING - as the targets get closer, the pitch the PINGS increases and the volume gets louder. DJ cuts a his sub’s anchor - but sees Suyin hasn’t done the same.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Cut away or you'll be killed!

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: You want to run, run, but I’m not leaving them...

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: (to himself) Yes, you are...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In an INCREDIBLE DISPLAY OF PILOTING SKILL, DJ uses the w of his Abyss Glider to BREAK SUYIN’S ANCHOR LINE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin - furious -  18.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: DJ, you son of a-- --BAM! BAM! BAM! Suyin doesn’t get to finish that thought because she’s hit by RISING DEBRIS FROM JUNJIE’S SUB. Instantly, her craft is damaged. Leaks spring. She begins to lose air pressure. ALARMS sound everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ hasn’t fared much better. He can see systems failing. flips dozens of switches from memory as he radios a repor

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Mana-One, this is Fastback One in the blind. Both subs have been damaged, pressure vessel failing, commencing emergency ascent. He opens a glass panel and FLIPS a switch which turns the ABYSS GLIDER into a craft as buoyant as an air balloon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the cracking cockpit glass over her head, Suyin s DJ's Abyss Glider begin to ascend. She reaches for the sa panel he used.... And flips it. SHE/WE HEAR - a muffled explosion. A compressed gas cannister has inflated her emergency ascent buoys. Her su rises like a missile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heller barks orders as he runs for the emergency lift.

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: Have the decompression chamber pressurized for 7,000 meters and get all hands to the starboard quarter for retrieval.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ and Suyin struggle to stay conscious and help guide th subs to the surface. The pressure and rapid ascent threat to rip their vehicles apart. And the pain is excruciating

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heller leads a staff of med-techs prepping the decomp tan  19.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DIVERS drop into the sea below. They will meet the subs a lock the hydraulic arms into position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We stay close on Suyin as she fades out of consciousness. Her cabin is a cacophony of system alarms and warning lig

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pressure shift attacks Suyin’s hold on reality. Her P becomes increasingly surreal as she closes in on the Mana One. The ship lights reflect on her sub window, blinding heavenly. We are losing her. Her only connection to the world those deafening warning bells. She’s surfaced but doesn’t know it. Masked faces come into frame, an alien intrusion into her fever dream.

dialogues.speaker: TO BLACK
dialogues.text: IN BLACK - we HEAR tap tap tap... tap tap tap...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin AWAKES with a start. She looks around. DJ is with her. And tap tap tap - Meiying is signalling to her on th glass window of the decompression chamber hatch.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Hi, sweetie! They can’t hear each other, so they communicate by touchi hands on the glass.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: (without turning to DJ, asks) Junjie and Carl?

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: No. But Francois and Luc are okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dimitri and Fan are pouring over schematics of the MULE S as Mac talks with Francois...

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (MIC)
dialogues.text: And you tried isolating Bus-B?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luc looks at Francois. Nods, he tried it.  20.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Our engines are fried, Mac. Air pressure’s good. Hull integrity is good. But I’m afraid you're going to have to come get us.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Any guess as to what hit you?

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Do they have freight trains down here? INT. ZHANG’S PRIVATE OFFICE - MANA ONE Zhang, Heller, and Mac discuss their options. Off their All three

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: How much air do they have?

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: 24 hours. That’s more than enough.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Dimitri needs five hours to repair the Abyss Gliders. Suyin and DJ can’t leave decomp for six - so I’m setting the dive for 1700 hours. nods...

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Which gives us time to get a pilot for Angel 3. The best rescue diver on the planet is in Lufeng...

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: --You can’t be serious...

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: ...-We need him. of them know who Mac means.

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: Mac, I appreciate your loyalty, but do I have to remind you what happened the last time he went this deep?

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: I don’t know what happened. And neither do you.  21.

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: He had a psychotic episode under pressure--

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: --That was your explanation, doctor. Not his.

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: Well - the Navy agreed with me.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Because it gave them a scapegoat. It let them close the books on bad mission and move on. (to Zhang) Dr. Zhang, a rescue like this, even with the best equipment in the world, is risky. If it’s me down there, if it’s my daughter going down there, there’s only one man on the planet I want for the job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wind whips across the arid ochre mesas of the Lufeng Quar We hear the sound of PICK-AXES. Then the delicate sound O BRUSH STROKES as A PhD CANDIDATE IN MARINE BIOLOGY carefu tries to separate what is fossil from what is Earth.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS TAYLOR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: You don’t have to be so delicate... The Candidate’s Professor - JONAS TAYLOR, 30s, USN-Retire takes his student’s tools and demonstrates a quicker meth Quizzing the girl as he goes...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Have you identified the fossil? The Candidate stares at him. He’s her professor, he’s als rugged and gorgeous and tends to leave people tongue-tied

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Carcharocles...

dialogues.speaker: PHD CANDIDATE
dialogues.text: ...Carcharocles Megaladon.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Good, and have you measured it?

dialogues.speaker: PHD CANDIDATE
dialogues.text: Eight centimeters...  22.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Which means...

dialogues.speaker: PHD CANDIDATE
dialogues.text: It was from a juvenile, 10-12 meters in length.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Very good. But the fact that it is black, fully carbonized, also means... He swings his hand axe at it... Clank... Nothing happens.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: You couldn't break it if you tried. He gives her a friendly wink, she laughs, and he walks of WE WIDEN -- to see this is a permanent Archeological Dig funded by the DEEP SEA CENTER AT TIANJIN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas stares off into the magnificent vista, as A TEACHIN ASSISTANT hands him some papers to look through.

dialogues.speaker: TEACHING ASSISTANT
dialogues.text: Looking forward to getting back to Tianjin, Professor?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: I do love these two weeks in the quarry, but a new semester means fresh minds to open to all the amazing realities of our world.

dialogues.speaker: TEACHING ASSISTANT
dialogues.text: You mean ‘possibilities’, right?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: 65 million years ago, this whole region was underwater. And those fossils out there were alive. Sure, the water has receded. But what makes you think the ocean itself has changed? The conversation trails off because of the sound of an arriving helicopter.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: We expecting guests?  23. The TA shakes his head. He goes to check a clip-board. Jonas sees Mac, Heller, and Zhang get out.

dialogues.speaker: TEACHING ASSISTANT
dialogues.text: There’s nothing on the schedule... The TA looks up - realizes he’s talking to an empty trail

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas gives Mac a big hug.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: How are you, Captain?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Better than you, Mac, judging by the looks of you.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Captain Taylor, I’m--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: I know who you are Dr. Zhang. It’s an honor and a privilege. Last, but not least, is a rather sheepish Heller.

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: Hello, Jonas.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Hey there, Tom. POW - Jonas punches Heller in the face. Heller goes down.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: (deadpan) That actually went better than I expected.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas looks through screen grabs taken from the video fee off of Junjie’s sub and the UNIS BOTs.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: How long after the BOTs were activated did you lose them?

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Maybe five minutes.  Mac shows 24.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: And where were you, exactly? him on the chart. Jonas gives Mac a look.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: You went back there?

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: It was my decision. That part of the trench has never been explored, its combination of depth and expanse make it--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: The last great unknown on Earth. Yeah, I’ve heard that before. It’s why the Navy had the Chesapeake doing maneuvers down there. It’s why they had to send me in to rescue her men when she was mysteriously disabled. And it’s why this guy blamed me when everyone died!

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: I didn’t blame you. I simply said that your after-action report, claiming you had been attacked by something down there, was likely the result of hypoxic dementia--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: After which I was court-martialed, black-balled from every diving operation in the world, and now receive a steady supply of hate mail from widows who think I’m the reason those men are gone.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Look, Jonas. I’m not a past or future guy. I’m present tense. I've got two crew members sitting down there--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: And who are you going to send for their rescuers when they get taken out too?

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Captain, I’ve read your account of what happened to you. Before today, (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I wouldn't have given credence to your theories. But now... Now, two of my friends are dead. And my daughter is only alive by providence. I’m here, we're here, because you give us the best chance of not adding any more friends to that list. Jonas looks out at the field of fossils. We don’t see wha he’s looking at, but we know he’s made up his mind.

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: Think of it as a chance to prove me wrong.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (looks at Heller a beat) Don’t you get it? I don’t want you to be wrong. Jonas walks out. They realize he’s heading for the helicopter. That’s good news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All four of them are seated, the machine is about to lift off. Heller stares at a SCREEN CAPTURE PHOTO in Mac’s han

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: You really think there’s something down there that could do that? Meaning, the BOT - torn in half. Mac looks OUT THE WINDOW

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: As a matter of fact, I do... Heller turns, and as the chopper lifts off, we REVEAL THE SITE IN FULL... And there, in the ochre canyon walls, is SET OF JAWS SO BIG that eight grad students - standing si by side - fit comfortably in its width. We HOLD on it and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The helicopter has landed. Mac and Jonas have split off f the other two. They walk across the platform with purpose Jonas’s attention drawn to the state-of-the-art subs. He eyeballs them, impressed. Very impressed.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: We dive in one hour.  26.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Why wait that long?

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: For starters, your two dive mates are in decomp... MAC INDICATES THE DECOMPRESSION TANK IN THE DISTANCE wher Meiying is sitting outside ‘talking’ with her mom.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: That's comforting. Mac and Jonas then DESCEND a stair, unaware that MEIYING, having seen them, has decided to follow them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meiying watches from a distance as Mac and Jonas inspect SUYIN’S ABYSS GLIDER up on a hydraulic lift. DIMITRI and are replacing the last of the damaged parts. Quick intros

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Jonas Taylor - Dimitri Karmanov - Linfan Chang. (asks Dimitri) So, what’s the verdict?

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: (furrowed brow) Suyin took a direct hit froma large piece of debris. The pressure lines were cut. There was damage to the sensor array. The entire Nav was smashed--

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: --Stop. Are you doing that thing where you tell me how bad it is, then tell me you managed to fix it, so you look like a hero? That hangs there a beat.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: No. I’m telling you it’s fixed. (beat, deadpan) Whether that makes me a hero or not is for others to decide. As Jonas and Mac walk away...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: I like him.  27.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meiying follows Jonas and Mac as they run into:

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Captain Taylor, I’m Presca Morris, one of the financial partners in Mana-One. I was looking up your records, and, well, all I found were records. Most dives below 20,0000 feet, most rescues in the history of the Navy, the list went on and on... Needless to say, I’m very glad you're with us.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Thank you, ma’am. As they walk off...

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: See, I told you I said good things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mac shows Jonas the simple stateroom. A bed, a bathroom..

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Jumpsuit in the closet. You know the drill.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: I do... (sees something) Although I’m not sure what to do with this... MEIYING is standing in the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Meiying, are you spying on us? This is Zhang's grand-daughter.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Hi, Meiying. I’m Jonas.

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: The crazy one. Jonas looks at Mac.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Well, I see my reputation precedes me. Who said that?  28.

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: My mom, when grandpa told her you were coming. DJ, Dr. Heller...

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: .-.I’m out of here...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Yeah, I bet you are... Mac EXITS, leaving Jonas and Meiying alone. Jonas gets a kick out of the little girl’s moxie.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: I’m not crazy. It’s just -- I’ve seen things no one else has.

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: That’s the definition of crazy.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (laughs ) You’re tough.

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: Titanium.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Titanium? Wow, I’ve never met a girl made of titanium. I’ve dated a few made of ice but... Jonas goes to squeeze Meiying’s biceps, which she’s offer as proof of her strength.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Those are some guns you’ve got--

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (ARRIVING)
dialogues.text: (in Mandarin) Meiying come here now. Meiying retreats to her mom’s side. Suyin, liberated from Decomp, is there in the doorway with DJ.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: You must be Suyin. And DJ--

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: --Briefing starts in ten minutes. With that Suyin and Meiying are gone, leaving DJ to follo beat later after a shrug.  29.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ENTIRE TEAM are pouring over charts of the Marianas Trench. There is a vast deep basin in the heart of it, labeled “SIREN’S VOID”. Mac is marking a position.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: From what Francois described, best guess is he’s along this ridge here, about 2,000 yards from.. Mac taps a RED CIRCLE on the chart.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: -..-This thermal vent. Dimitri’s run the numbers, and with Angel 2's fuel tanks emptied, she’s light enough for the three of you to tow to the surface--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Send me first. Off their looks.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Send me, alone, in the Mule. Let me see if I can do a hatch-to- hatch...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: If the hatch is blocked, then the two of you can come down to tow...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Okay, first of all, your method will waste hours...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: But put less lives at risk...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Second, I notice you picked yourself to be the lone diver, in spite of...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: .-.-In spite of the time off, yes. I have the most experience...  30.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: ...I was going to say, in spite of the fact that on your last rescue everyone else was killed. That hangs there a beat. Landslide.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: They were killed because they didn’t listen to me. And there’s not a day goes by that I don’t think about how they could have made it if they believed what I was telling them...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: ...Are we sure we want him with us...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: ..-But, no, they were convinced it had to be a landslide. The word hangs there. Suddenly, all is quiet.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: I don’t blame them. I thought that at first too. I mean, what else could show up on the sonar like that? What else could tear open metal like it was tin? You don’t think about the fact that this ‘landslide’ isn’t triggering any readings on the seismograph. You don’t say to yourself - this is the most accurate, lethal, guided landslide in the 4 billion year history of geology. Because what else could it be, right? After a long silence.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Let me go, alone--

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: No one appreciates your expertise more than I do, but this is our operation, we’re doing it as planned. Is that a problem? Jonas considers it - looks at Mac.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I sincerely hope not.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Says the Monster Hunter.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: You think I’m hunting whatever is down there? (beat) It’s hunting us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carbon fiber and titanium gleam under the Kleig lights. 31. SUYIN AND DJ inspect their Abyss Gliders. JONAS stares at open hatch of his Mule. He seems HESITANT.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (ARRIVING)
dialogues.text: The results of the popularity contest are in. You didn’t win.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (looking at Suyin and DJ) I don’t care if they like me. Will they listen to me?

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Zhang's daughter is tough, but remember she just lost two friends--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Will - they - listen?

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: (nods, yes) They're the two best sub pilots on the planet that aren’t named you. They've got ice in their veins and years of experience... Mac's voice trails off because he and Jonas are now distracted by THE SIGHT OF DJ, kneeling in front of Fastb 2, holding a small bundle of BURNING SAGE towards the hat

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Yeah. Um. That’s white sage. Something to do with the clearing of negative energies. (beat) You want me to ask him to stop?  32.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (droll) I want you to ask him for more. Jonas notices Meiying, who is with Suyin, waving at him..

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: At least somebody likes me. Jonas waves back.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI, (PRE-LAP/RADIO)
dialogues.text: Fastbacks clear for drop. In ten, nine, eight... INT. JONAS’S MULE SUB - “ANGEL THREE” - NIGHT CLOSE ON Jonas -- as his Mule is LOWERED into the water. can see the Abyss Gliders (Fastback 1 and 2), on either s of him, held in angled chutes on the sides of the station Their launch will be dynamic. Jonas’s is more traditional

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Seven, six, five, four... The OCEAN swallows Angel Three.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A deep breath from Suyin as she reaches for the drop hand

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Three, two, one... Release. --And pulls it. The Abyss Glider PLUMMETS into the ocean, cutting through the surface like an Olympic diver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ's Abyss Glider PIERCES the sea with tremendous momentu and a slight roll. DJ tilts his control stick. His ship responds instantly, stopping itself, and establishing a h a few meters below the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unlike DJ and Suyin, it’s taking Jonas a few moments to g positive control over his sub and establish it as stable.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: You need a minute there, Jonas?

dialogues.speaker: DJ, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Yeah. You look a little seasick.  33. Jonas settling in - remembering the feel of being at sea.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Mock all you want. You two have the Ferraris, I’m in the mule.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FAN has the dive up on TACTICAL DISPLAY. HELLER has all their vitals on screen. DIMITRI and ZHANG are at the planning table, and MAC (with Morris behind him) is at th center of it all.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Rescue One, commence descent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin pushes her control stick forward and smoothly accelerates away from the surface.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Francois, we’re on our way...

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT
dialogues.text: The three subs, in formation, DISAPPEAR into the depths.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost two hours have gone by on the MISSION CLOCK. Tacti shows the THREE SUBS are at nearly 6,000 meters below the sea, and approaching a LAYER that’s marked “THERMOCLINE”.

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Rescue One, approaching Thermocline.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: What’s the thermocline?

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: It’s a dense layer of cold water that separates the upper ocean from the deep sea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ and Suyin move reflexively. Flipping switches and tightening their harnesses.  34.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Heaters to full. Autostabilizers to on. Harness secure. Suyin BEGINS TO EXPERIENCE TURBULENCE. She reads a gauge.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Entering thermocline. Sea temp now 39 and dropping.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas is getting bounced around harder. But that’s not th problem. The problem is it’s starting to FREEZE in here.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Mana, I’m showing a fault in the heating system. Can you confirm?

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Need us to tell you where the ‘on’ switch is, Jonas?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan confirms what Jonas sees.

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Jonas, we see the fault. Try re- cycling the system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas exhales, we can see frost on his breath. Re-cycle t system? That’s going to require him pulling out a checkli

dialogues.speaker: DJ, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Just follow my lead, man.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: DJ, I’m not in the mood--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ isn’t teasing him.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: My temp gauge hasn’t gone below 48 and my ride is smooth as glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mac is about to tell Fan to check that but she already ha  35.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: (turns to Mac) He’s right. Looks like DJ has found some kind of warm water upcurrent through the thermocline. (looks at Zhang) Have you ever heard of that?

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: No. The thermocline is a wall.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Yeah well, there’s a hole in this wall, and if you don’t mind, I'd like to send our team through it so Jonas doesn’t freeze to death.

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Jonas, good news. You can put down the checklist...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas tosses the checklist aside.

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Come to 270 and then shadow DJ, he’s found a smoother ride. Suyin, suggest you do the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin corrects her course.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Nice job, DJ.

dialogues.speaker: DJ, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Totally all skill on my part.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas feels the ride smooth out, and sees his SEA TEMP GA rise. The frost inside his cabin begins to thaw.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: I’ve found the channel. I’m going to power down and enjoy the ride... Jonas flips a bunch of switches, KILLING ALL OF HIS EXTER LIGHTS, plunging him into darkness.  36.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin is a few hundred meters above/behind Jonas.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Angel Three, did you just kill your lights?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Affirmative.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: You feel like telling us why?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: See for yourself. Suyin, annoyed, decides to go ahead. She kills her lights finds herself in darkness. She’s about to get mad when... HER FASTBACK is suddenly illuminated by COLORFUL BIOLUMINESCENT LIGHTS from outside. It’s dazzling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ, in near total darkness, is already enjoying the show.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Ok, I’m not gonna lie. This is awesome. The warm water channel is filled with tiny plankton and a that LIGHT UP when agitated, meaning DJ is leaving a trai bioluminescent light in his wake...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a few moments, Jonas just sits there, marvelling...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: It’s good to be home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three of them descend, like rainbow-tailed comets, through the inky blackness...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TACTICAL now shows all three subs passing 10,000 meters.  37.

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Rescue 1, approaching bottom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As both SUYIN and DJ power back up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas is more reluctant to turn everything back on.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Fastback one, suggest we keep power to minimal. No need to tell the whole world we’re here.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Negative, Angel Three. This is a rescue, we want all systems on.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Look, I just think we want to keep a low profile--

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Did somebody say rescue?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois and Luc can see the position and search lights o the three rescue subs in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Cause that’s the word the of the day here at Chez Francois. You’ve each won a free dinner!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin is thrilled to report.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Mana-One. We’ve found them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morris and Zhang greatly relieved. Dimitri satisfied with his work. Fan squeezes his hand.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Let’s save the celebrating for when they’re back please.  38.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas watches as Suyin accelerates by him to join DJ in approaching the sub.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Jonas, we’ll secure our tow lines first, then you do the heavy lifting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois and Luc can see Fastbacks One and Two getting closer. Everything is great until A LONG SHADOW passes between them and the rescue subs.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Guys... Did you see that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas’s SONAR comes to life... PING... PING...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Target, bearing 120...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ checks his sonar. It’s PINGING. His HEADS-UP display h put squares on multiple points in the darkness...

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: I've got it too, multiple bogeys...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Then let’s hurry this up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin takes her sub down a little faster and THROWS ON HE FLOOD LIGHTS illuminating the dark...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Fastback, that is a bad idea-- Suyin reaches the bottom. Her engines KICK UP THE SAND --

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Dammit... -- creating an undersea FOG that, because of the lack of current, just hangs there, obscuring everything.  39.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: I've lost all visibility. Repeat, lost all visibility... She gets occasional glimpses of clear water in between th patches of cloudy sand. SOMETHING passes by in the darkne

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: (stunned) There’s something down here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ gets a glimpse of SOMETHING too.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: I see it! But it is gone as quickly as it was there.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Why aren't we getting it on sonar?!

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: The sand fog’s made the sonar useless...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As all three pilots are now talking over one another.

dialogues.speaker: DJ, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Mana-One, we are NOT alone down here, repeat, not alone...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: You both need to pull back...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Negative, I’m attaching my tow-line to Angel Two. DJ, standby...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin centers ANGEL TWO in her sights and FIRES her tow-l Whooosh - a thin, magnetic-tipped length of wire shoots o into the darkness towards ANGEL TWO but... THUNK... IT HI SOMETHING ELSE FIRST and falls to the sea floor.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: What the...? --WHAM!! SOMETHING MASSIVE hits Fastback One. It’s a glancing blow but it sends it SPINNING OUT OF CONTROL.  40.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ is in thick sand fog when he suddenly finds himself fa to face with FASTBACK ONE as Suyin finally regains contro

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Suyin, are you oka-- BAM, now it’s DJ’s turn to be hit by something. He spins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heller watches as SUYIN AND DJ’S pulses soar into the 160 both can be heard SHOUTING STATUS reports over the radio.

dialogues.speaker: DI
dialogues.text: I’ve been hit. I’m okay...!

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Mana-One, we are totally defensive, unknown contacts...! JONAS'S PULSE is steady. And that’s because...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas makes a choice. He slams the throttle forward.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Angel Two, forget about the tow. Prepare for hatch-to-hatch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Angel Three plunges fearlessly through the zero visibilit

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas deftly rolls his sub on its side, aligning its hatc with Angel Two’s hatch.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Standby for docking! The two hatches meet with a THUD that reverberates into t darkness at the speed of sound. It travels out past the fastback subs, into the black, where SOMETHING REACTS to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ping. Suyin looks down. A clear target on passive sonar.  41.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Angel Three. Single target. 2000 yards. Bearing. Right at you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas powers up to create a seal between hatches.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Guys, let’s go. I’m not sure we've got a lot of time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois and Luc work fast on their end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where everyone can only listen.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Angel Three, 1200 yards... A thousand...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois unseals his upper hatch and opens it. After some residual water falls out, he is safe to climb through to hatch of the Angel Three.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Coming up on 800 yards, you need to get out of there! As Luc preps the ship for evac, HE SUDDENLY SEES SOMETHIN out the sub window that stops him in his tracks...

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Come on, Luc! Come on! «+..a vague bioluminescent trail behind some otherwise invisible beast that’s coming right at them.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: 600 yards... 400 yards! Luc knows there’s no time. He closes his hatch and--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luc BLOWS the lock, detaching violently from Angel Three. And not a moment too soon. Because... ..-BAM! Angel Two is smashed into oblivion by something 7 feet long and moving at more than 50 miles per hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin feels the vibrations of the terrible collision.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Angel Three, come in?! Angel Three... As she waits for a reply, PING... PING... Suyin’s sonar t her the mysterious monster is now coming for her and DJ.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sparks explode inside the main cabin as Jonas and Francoi recover from the partial impact. The only light comes intermittently from the flashing red alarms blaring.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: This is Angel Three, we lost Luc. You both need to power down now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PING... PING.... DJ realizes they don’t have much time.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: It’s drawn to energy. You need to go dark!

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: --But we’ll be sitting ducks!--

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: That’s better than dead ducks! DJ's turns off EVERYTHING that sends out a signal, includ lights. That leaves only the PINGING of his passive sonar which gets faster as whatever is out there closes in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin now sits in the dark too. As the PINGING becomes frantic, she stares out into the inky sea and takes her h away from the controls. She braces for impact as SWOOOOOS SOMETHING MASSIVE HURTLES JUST PAST HER...  43.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ feels it go by too... Then, he exhales. He’s alive. Fo now. But the PINGING of his sonar now reveals that:

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: It’s circling us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mac and his team, desperate to help.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Use your infrared, you should be able to see and not be seen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin turns on the sub’s infrared lights and pulls down a visor... HER POV -- It’s similar to night vision, a world in black green. Suyin can see the distant outline of the trench wa she can see DJ’s sub, and she can see A BLUR OF MOVEMENT which leaves in its wake a random trail of bioluminescenc

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: I don’t think seeing is going to help much. Any other ideas, Mana?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ, scared, has also gone to infrared. The first thing he sees is the SHAPE of Suyin’s Abyss Glider. So fish-like.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Here’s an idea. Dimitri, the next time you design a sub, maybe don’t make it look like the catch of the day! Then DJ freezes... HIS INFRARED POV -- A GIANT SQUID, with a body twenty fee long and tentacles measuring out to more than a hundred, now floating right in between him and Suyin.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Suyin...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin turns and sees the monster. They seem totally helpl against the mighty Kraken, which is now advancing menacin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --UNTIL -- WHAM -- THE GIANT SQUID IS TORN IN HALF in one violent attack by A_MEGALADON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they hear screams and want to know...

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Is everybody okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin has ripped off the goggles.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: It’s a shark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas hears exactly what he was hoping he wouldn’t hear..

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Huge. 60 feet. Maybe more.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (to himself) Carcharocles Megaladon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone takes a beat to process the news.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: It ripped a giant squid right in half.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ was even closer to the mauling. He’s actually drifting through what’s left of the squid.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Yeah. And I say we get out of here before it get gets hungry again! DJ starts to power up when--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: No, DJ. Don’t. If you power on, it will come for you. You have to surface without using your engines.  45.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin shakes her head to no one.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: We're too deep, Jonas. We need our engines to climb from down here. We’re at zero ballast. As if to emphasize the danger, SOMETHING speeds by in the darkness, ROCKING THE TWO FASTBACKS IN ITS WAKE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas looks at Francois - is she right? Francois nods, ye

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Mules have standard ballast tanks, but not the fastbacks. This deep, they have to power up--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: If they power up - they’re fish food!

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: They're already fish food! We need to get them off the menu! Jonas gets an IDEA. He keys the mic.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: What about the thermal vent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin understands the plan the minute she hears it...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: That upcurrent of warm water we rode down. That could carry you up a few thousand meters without you needing power.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ wants to be hopeful but...

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: I don’t mean to be a downer but that vent is a mile from here and I don’t think paddling is an option.  46.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas is one step ahead of them. He turns to Francois.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Does this thing have flares?

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Why don’t I like that question?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone, desperate for ideas, when they hear Jonas’ plan

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Fastbacks one and two, when I tell you to, I want you to both power up and go flank speed for the vents. Looks are exchanged. What’s Jonas doing?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Mana, can you give them a bearing to that vent please?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ and Suyin are dialing in 050 but--

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Jonas, what about the shark?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas trims the last of the ballast trim tabs. He and Francois are ready to do whatever it is they’re about to

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: It’ll be pre-occupied. With us.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: (to Jonas, droll) I just want to say this has officially stopped feeling like a rescue. Jonas smiles. Francois nods back. And...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Now!  47.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin can suddenly see a bloom of white as -- FWOOMP! -- BRIGHT LIGHTS of Angel Three shatter the darkness like an undersea North Star. Suyin is jostled by the WAKE of SOMETHING MASSIVE OVERHEAD. It completely eclipses the An Three, taking seconds, that feel like minutes, to pass, u even in the darkness, she makes out the unmistakable shap an ENORMOUS TAIL FIN snapping right in front of her.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Oh my God. The invisible beast heads for Angel Three.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Angel Three, it’s coming to you!

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Head for the vent! Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ and SUYIN both power up and race for the vent.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Range to vent... 1500 meters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois and Jonas can see the Two Abyss Gliders race for vent as the bioluminescent storm that is the MEG heads straight for the Mule.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: That’s it. Come on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ peering into the darkness with his Infrared Visor. It’ like flying at night... We can tell they’re moving very f

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: 1000 meters!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone is on the edge of their seat...

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: You think this will work? Mac indicates Jonas’s pulse. Which is steady.  48.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: He does. So I do too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois is getting nervous, but Jonas remains calm...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: 600 meters!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Using Infrared, Suyin can see THE THERMAL VENT AHEAD...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Vent in sight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ sees it too. Then suddenly a TENTACLE ATTACKS HIS SUB.

dialogues.speaker: AHHH...
dialogues.text: For a moment, DJ thinks he’s squid food. He is ensnared i the angry embrace of the massive cephalopod. But then he realizes these are just PIECES of what’s left of that squ

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: I’m good. Sub’s gonna need a wash though.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Entering vent. Controls on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch as first Suyin and then DJ enter the plume of violent water that rockets upwards... Careful eyes will see that the VENT ITSELF has been broke open by the REMAINS OF A CRASHED UNIS BOT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fight to keep their ships stabilized...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Keep the bubble level and watch your hull temp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ looks out the turbulent water, at the lights of Angel Three, and the black mass of the MEG hurtling towards it.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Everything I said about that guy. I’m taking it back right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas can almost feel the beast upon them now.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Standby... Standby... NOW! Jonas BLOWS all the BALLAST TANKS, and Francois hits the RESCUE FLARE switch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The suddenly rising sub drops a FLARE, which spreads like comet tail behind them. As it does, Jonas kills the sub lights, so all focus is on the brilliant burning star. It drops through the inky depths. Illuminating a wall fil with brightly colored algae, coral, alien creatures, unti WHOOSH, the massive beast snatches the flare, its enormou jaws illuminated for the first time. The creature swims through its target, colliding violently with the undersea mountain range like a fiery wrecking ball. The sea wall t once provided shelter for Francois, now reduced to rubble

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On TACTICAL: They can see Angel Three rising, and...

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Fastbacks One and Two are rising. They're going to make it...

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: He did it... He did it... Joy begins to ripple through the DCC, and it increases te fold when they hear Jonas’ deadpan voice over the coms:

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Mana, this is Angel Three. We’ve blown our ballast and are rising, power off. We’ve lost our directional control so someone’s going to have to come meet us.  50.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (MIC)
dialogues.text: (laughing) That can be arranged-- But suddenly the good mood SOURS as -- PING... PING...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The PINGS are here too. The MEG is coming for them.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: But all the power’s off...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: I guess she learned that trick. Jonas begins to power the sub back on.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: We have to make flank speed for the thermocline. It can’t follow us through that! Francois, you ever been shot out of a cannon?

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Right now, that actually sounds like a pretty good idea. Jonas shoves the throttle forward. They rise like a missi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Sonar images tell the story. Angel Three is rising... The Meg below closing in fast... And the THERMOCLINE loom

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: At what water temperature will that thing have to turn back?

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: I don’t know. Megalodons are supposed to be extinct.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Best guess then!

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Fifty degrees. ANGEL THREE’S TEMP gauge - now at 58, ticks down to 57...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois watches through the back window. So far, no Meg.  51.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Approaching Thermocline. You better grab on to something. WHAM! The sub is SLAMMED by turbulence. Bad turbulence.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: If I don’t slow down we might break apart! But now Francois can see THE MEGALADON - it’s closing fas

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: That’s a negative on slowing down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The good news is the temp is dropping... 54... 53... 52..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bad news is the beast has nearly reached them. And, t make matters worse, all kinds of system alarms are firing BOOM! BOOM! They continue to get hammered by turbulence.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: We're losing the engines!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From outside the sub, we see the terrifying reality of ju how close the Meg now is to the sub.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois’ chilling POV of the Meg, only seconds away. Ala blaring, the sub rocking, and the excruciating ascent...

dialogues.speaker: AAAAAHHHH
dialogues.text: The MEG is about to reach them when SUDDENLY it turns bac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we see the temperature gauge on Angel Three is now at 50... 49... And they all see that the MEG has turned arou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas throttles back what’s left of the engines, the sub literally falling to pieces around him and Francois.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Angel Three, above the Thermocline. Request permission to never go back down there again.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Permission granted! Great job! Jonas and Francois share a very satisfied smile.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Nice to meet you by the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Abyss Gliders head for the surface. As they speed off we notice THE BLOODY TRAIL OF SQUID DJ’s sub is leaving behind... A trail that goes down... And down... And eventually... Into that warm water channel through the thermocline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGEL THREE bursts through the surface. Jonas pops the hatch, climbs up and sees... NOTHING BUT OCEAN.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: So much for a welcoming committee. BLARE! Comes the sound of a SHIP’S HORN as Jonas and Francois turn around to see ZHANG’S RESEARCH VESSEL - THE MAZU -- a thousand yards away. And closing.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Now that’s more like it. The SHIP’S HORN sounds again as we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peace and quiet in one of Hainan’s most tranquil bays. The MAZU is anchored a few hundred yards off shore from T NEW 5-STAR “MANA RESORT AND SPA”. The place is a few mont from opening, but Morris’s crown jewel is fully built, wi skeleton staff is putting it through its paces.  53.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas enjoys a hot shower. He’s cleaning up, and he’s try to psychologically decompress from what’s just happened. TURNS OFF the water and just stands there, breathing.

dialogues.speaker: EXT/INT. BEACH BUNGALOW
dialogues.text: A knock and Jonas's unlocked door swings open. SUYIN and MEIYING are there. Meiying holding something in her hands

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Jonas? Jonas? JONAS - having not heard them - steps out from his bathro Luckily, he’s in a towel.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN AND JONAS
dialogues.text: Oh, excuse me... Sorry, I didn’t know... Meiying BURSTS OUT laughing. And, as Jonas retreats to quickly pull on some clothes out of their line of sight, begins to LAUGH too - because Meiying’s glee is infectiou

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (calls) She kills me, you know that?

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: (calls back) Tell me about it. Saying no to her is almost impossible. Jonas returns, dressed and smiling. Is this the first tim Suyin has allowed herself to realize he’s handsome? She's suddenly very aware. Luckily, her daughter to the rescue.

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: This is for you... Meiying hands him the somewhat crudely wrapped blob. It’s DOLPHIN CHARM made of...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Titanium.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: The dolphin is the symbol of the Zhang family. They’re also known to save people... from sharks. Meiying reveals that she wears a matching, smaller, versi of the charm around her neck. Jonas is very touched.  54.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: No, thank you. Meiying begins to tug on her mom, wants her to ask Jonas something, but Suyin has her own thought to finish first.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: I was hard on you. I didn’t treat you with the respect you deserved--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Forget about it--

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: You_saved our lives. Her sincerity makes him uncomfortable. The intimacy of it He shrugs it off but--

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Jonas. Thank you. He nods. You’re welcome. Now, Meiying’s tugging reaches a fever pitch.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Whatever it is, she’s not giving up. Suyin stops her daughter with a look. Then...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Meiying wants me to ask you to join us for tea. It’s another family tradition. We share tea every time I’m back from a dive.

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: Only she missed it last time because she was in that stupid Decompression Tank. Jonas laughs at Meiying yet again. But then he sees something through the doorway behind them. It’s MAC and ZHANG walking a main building of the resort.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: I'd like to, but actually I have to talk to Mac about getting back to the mainland. Those words sting Suyin in a way she hadn’t expected.  55.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: You're leaving? Right. Of course.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
