dialogues.text: Now that everyone’s safe... I expect your father has a full plate without me to worry about. Suyin hides her disappointment. Meiying doesn’t.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A room with a view of the Pacific. Right now it hosts an INTENSE DISCUSSION between Zhang, Morris, Heller, and Mac

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: .-.I’m not saying what happened wasn’t a tragedy, I just want to set that aside long enough to talk about what we found down there and what it means for the future. Because the choices we make between now and when you announce what happened could mean billions of dollars of added value. REVEAL - JONAS, outside, listening and thinking that-- EXT/INT. THE RESORT’S OPEN-AIR RESTAURANT - DAY Jonas finds Suyin and Meiying have set up tea at a table along the water’s edge.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: --On second thought, tea sounds great. Meiying claps.

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: Okay, sit here... And do exactly as I say...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (laughing, to Suyin) Apple doesn’t fall from the tree. Suyin blushes.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO
dialogues.text: A PICTORIAL of the ocean is unfurled. It depicts the sea seen from the side, so is all about the VARIOUS DEPTHS.  56.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: In general, the deeper you go, the further you get from the sun, the colder the ocean gets.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: But where we dove today, at the very bottom, that water was warm. Zhang indicates ‘Siren’s Void’ - the vast basin of the Marianas Trench - an area more than 1,000 miles long. The CHART bottom...

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Yes, a portion of the deepest ocean is heated by volcanic vents. In these areas, as you get away from the heat source, so in this case as you rise, the water gets colder. makes it clear. The water goes from warm at the gets cold as it rises away from the heat source...

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: The coldest water is always here in the thermocline. This water is too cold to support any life.

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: So whatever lives above, stays above. And whatever lives below, stays below.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Given that we’ve never explored Siren’s Void, and given we've encountered at least one species, the Megaladon, heretofore thought extinct, I think the odds are there is an entire ecosystem down there that has remained untouched for millions of years.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: (thrilled) Meaning we’re sitting on top of our very own Jurassic sea! INTERCUT -- THE RESORT’S OPEN-AIR RESTAURANT - SUNSET Meiying is showing Jonas the proper way to hold his tea c and Jonas is purposely getting it wrong to make her laugh

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: He’s funny!  57.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Yeah. Funny looking.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Do you have children, Jonas?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: No. When I was in the Navy, my wife and I kept putting it off... Then after we got divorced, I focused all my energy on...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Proving you weren’t crazy.

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: See, I told you she said you were crazy! That gets more laughs. But then, as kids often do, Meiyin suddenly realizes something and gets sad.

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: Wait. Does that mean you don’t have a family? Jonas shakes his head, he doesn’t.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Got room for us? FAN arrives, with DIMITRI and DJ. FRANCOIS is close behin

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: The more the merrier. Dimitri, since when do you drink tea?

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: (nods to Fan) Since she makes me. That gets a good LAUGH. Dimitri frowns.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: I wasn’t joking. That gets a BIGGER LAUGH.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO
dialogues.text: Where Morris is acting like they’ve just struck gold.  58.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Why am I the only one excited here? I’m no Marine Biologist, but even I remember the prehistoric oceans were filled will all sorts of amazing creatures.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Including one that just killed three of our people.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Again, I’m not discounting that...

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: That's exactly what you’re doing...

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Speculation is dangerous, Ms. Morris. Only one thing is clear: we've found something very special, so we must proceed with caution. I'm afraid our plans to commercialize the Mana-One must be put on indefinite hold.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: You can’t be serious...

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: The platform is located directly above this new world...

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Which means we should double its size. Then build a second one--

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: This isn’t about attracting visitors. It’s about making sure we protect the ecosystem.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: If those things have been down there for 200 million years, I think their ecosystem can handle it-

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: I’m talking about our Ecosystem. (it hangs there a beat) The world we live in, a world whose entire balance of life would shift violently if even one pre-historic creature found its way up here.  59. INTERCUT -- THE RESORT’S OPEN-AIR RESTAURANT - SUNSET Where everyone is laughing now - relieved - letting go of some of the tension. DJ raises his tea.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: I'd like to propose a toast. To Jonas.

dialogues.speaker: ALL
dialogues.text: To Jonas.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Wait... (raises his) To Junjie, Carl, and Luc. If Jonas wasn’t a full-member of the team, then that gest puts him over the top. It’s met with nods and teary eyes. They drink, and then after they put their cups down all e turn to Francois.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: So, Francois. You got anything stronger than tea in your bungalow?

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Why is it the Frenchman who always has to have the wine? (beat, a grin) I‘1l be right back... Suyin and Jonas exchange a smile. A smile that lingers. A smile that keeps them focusing on each other even as we B TO HEAR the sound of a skiff’s engine racing into the bay

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: There’s something out there...

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO
dialogues.text: Morris looks at Zhang and the rest.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Dr. Zhang, you are a brilliant man. But if you think you can control what’s about to happen, you are, forgive me, very naive. Before today, your platform was a specialty attraction. But when the world hears what you found, it is going to be the most desired destination on Earth. Every child (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: on the planet will want to come here. Every parent will make it a priority. This resort, and every resort within 500 miles will devote themselves to what’s down there. Whether we like that or not-- Morris stops as suddenly the door is thrown open. SUYIN, breathless from running, is there.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Dr. Heller! INT. RESORT’S BEACH - SUNSET/NIGHT Suyin and Heller race down to the water's edge - (Mac, Zh and Morris close behind). They find the rest of the team encircled a fishing boat’s skiff, whose PILOT has driven right up on the sand. Then they see why: A SECOND MAN - lying unconscious and bleeding on the sand

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: (quickly goes to work) He’s in shock and suffering from severe hypothermia. We need to get him to a hospital, right away--.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: We called for an ambulance.

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: Good, in the meantime, you can help me make sure he doesn’t lose any more blood. As Fan joins Heller in bandaging the seemingly endless nu cuts on the man’s body, Mac asks the big question.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: What happened? The Skiff’s Pilot answers in Mandarin.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (TRANSLATING)
dialogues.text: His ship was fishing when they heard a crash. They turned and saw their sister ship had been smashed. Not an explosion, just smashed. By the time they got over to the wreckage, this man was the only one in the water. The others had vanished.  61. The AMBULANCE has arrived. PARAMEDICS come racing over wi a stretcher. Heller supervises as they take the patient t the ambulance... SKIFF’S PILOT (in broken English) Sea Monster. He said - a Sea Monster attacked his ship. As THE ENTIRE TEAM exchanges glances we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mazu’s anchor clears the surface, and the boat pivots until it is pointed out sea. Then its mighty engines roar life - and the Mazu heads out into the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even with DJ and Suyin’s Abyss Gliders in tow, the Mazu c go as fast as 30 knots, its bow piercing the dark waters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas is up near the bow rail, looking out into night, wondering... Shaking his head as Mac looks on.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: If that thing followed us... If it’s up here somehow...

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: If being the key word.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: He called it a sea monster, Mac. All his life he’s worked the ocean, and he called it a sea monster... As if on cue the Mazu’s engines grow quiet and the ship

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DECELERATES... Now we see why Because they are drifting through floating wooden debris... A whole field of it.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (droll) You think a great white did this?

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: I think we're about to find out.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: How?  62. Off Mac’s look...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close on FAN pulling on a wet suit. DIMITRI zips her up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas looking at Zhang and Morris. He’s backed by DJ and Francois. Suyin somewhere in the middle.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Tell me this is a joke...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FAN, now fully suited up, CHECKS THE ACTION on a CARBON F SPEAR GUN that is as light-weight as it is bad-ass lookin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas, continuing his rant.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ...Tell me we're not seriously considering doing this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DIMITRI is filling SPEAR-TIPS (rounds for the Spear Gun) liquid etorphine from glass medical bottles.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: An elephant is knocked out with 10 cc’s - so 100?

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: (not messing around) Use the whole damn bottle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: -..-Because unless I missed something, this is insane. All eyes turn to Zhang. Zhang looks at Fan and Dimitri.  63.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: (disagrees forcefully) If the Meg followed DJ's trail up through the thermocline, then we can’t let it get away. We know it likes electromagnetic energy - that means Dimitri’s cage will draw it in like a moth to flame...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: .+-Did you just compare that thing to a moth? This is madness...

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: .--Actually madness, if I understand Dr. Zhang correctly, would be to let this creature roam off towards the fishing fleet. Those boats wouldn’t stand a chance.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (glares at Morris) A captured Meg would make for great advertising, is that it? Zhang has heard enough.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: We can’t avoid the truth, no matter how unpleasant. If there is a Megaladon here, if we leave it free to feed and mate, then we would be responsible for the worst ecological disaster in history. We, who have given our lives to protect these oceans. (he looks at Dimitri) Are you sure your cage will hold?

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: Math never lies. The Megaladon could be the size of this ship, the cage will not break.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: I‘1l bet my life on it. She takes Dimitri’s hand. Squeezes it.  64.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are TWO KEY FEATURES to the back of the MAZU: One i small HELIPAD. The other is a PAIR OF MASSIVE RIGGING CRANES. And it is from one of those crane’s that-- --DIMITRI’S DIVE CYLINDER is now suspended. The DIVE CYLINDER is a wonder. A ten foot-tall tube, made SELEXIS, a clear material, plastic in appearance, that is STRONGEST MAN-MADE MATERIAL in HISTORY. The CYLINDER has no corners, no weak points, and is large enough to hold several divers, though only FAN will be go down in it this time. OPENINGS cut in the center and the top of the structure a too small for a shark to get through, but large enough fo FAN to use as murder holes for her SPEAR GUN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mac operates the crane, lowers the DIVE CYLINDER into the water, stopping when it is half submerged to allow FAN, f suited up, to climb inside. Dimitri leans over the top, hands Fan her spear gun. Fan cocks it with confidence. Dimitri stares at her.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: Is it weird that I’m a little turned on?

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: By the sight of your girlfriend holding a high-velocity spear gun? Yes, it’s a little weird.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: (smiles) You've never used the word girlfriend before.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Please put me in the water. Dimitri smiles, shuts the top, and nods to Mac...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mac pulls a lever and the Dive Cylinder sinks into the se Water floods the interior through the openings in the cen and top of the chamber. Among those watching the ‘launch’ is JONAS. He shakes his head, worried.  65.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: Jonas, I’m telling you. The cage will not break. We begin to hear the sound of an APPROACHING HELICOPTER. Jonas turns to Suyin -- what gives?

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: I told father if we were going shark hunting then he needed to evacuate all non-essential personnel to Hainan. Including... Meiying, who is standing with Zhang, arms crossed. Visibl upset at her mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cylinder drops quickly. The invisible walls create an astonishing visual, as if Fan is standing underwater. LIG snap ON and THE EXTERNAL CAMERAS position themselves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just inside the aft deck, the ship’s dive room isn’t as f as the one on the Mana One. THERE’S A BANK OF SMALL TV MONITORS showing FAN and VARIOUS CAMERAS’ POVs. THERE’S A SONAR SCREEN. CRANE/WINCH controls. And a MIC.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Radio check. He looks at the MONITOR as FAN gives him a thumbs up.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Okay, taking you down to 100 meters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The WHINE of the winch lowering the Dive Cylinder is no m for the ROAR of the HELICOPTER ENGINE. Non-Essential PERSONNEL are climbing aboard the chopper. Then only MEIY is left to get on-board.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: (over the noise) I love you. I/’11 see you soon. Meiying turns to the helicopter but then... RUNS AWAY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meiying disappears into the ship. Suyin goes after her.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: (to Zhang) Do you want them to wait?

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: (shakes his head no) We’ll put her on the next one. Morris NODS to the pilot. The HELICOPTER lifts off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DIVE CYLINDER stops at 100M below the surface. The wa surrounding it now a deep rich black. Fan turns to a smal CONTROL BOX - we see a series of switches marked “ELECTRI REPELLENT FIELD”. Click - click - click. She turns the FIELD ON. For an INSTANT we see a tesla-coil like ELECTRI CHARGE shoot through the CLEAR material.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire team stand behind Mac, watching the monitors.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Okay, if that thing likes power, she just became the equivalent of a T-Bone steak. Jonas shakes his head. That’s NOT a good thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FAN'S POV - Nothing but deep, dark blue in every directio We HEAR her breathing, she’s trying to stay calm... But W ALL YOU SEE IS DARK BLUE, WHEN YOU ARE WAITING for SOMETH to appear, it is HARD TO STAY CALM. Is that something...? No... What about that? No... A 12-Foot GREAT WHITE passes over her head. She gasps!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Great White is visible on the monitors and the SONAR.

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: Here comes a second one... They can see the SHARKS on the sonar, sometimes before th see them on the camera...  67.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: And a third...

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: We've got ourselves a party.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drawn by the bait fish dangling off the rigging at the to the cylinder, the GREAT WHITES continue to increase in number. FAN tries to keep them all in sight as...

dialogues.speaker: NUDGE...ZAP
dialogues.text: The first of the sharks grabs for a meal and finds out th the SELEXIS is ELECTRIFIED! The shark recoils as the Cylinder rocks back and forth from the attempt. A SECOND SHARK and then a THIRD try their luck, but they the same painful fate. FAN’s cylinder is swaying back and forth but she’s loving it, laughing, like she’s on an amusement park ride. Everywhere she looks she sees Great Whites, all of them amazing. None of them what she’s hoping to see. And then, as she does a complete 360 turn in the cylinder she begins to notice something: The Great Whites are vanishing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their retreat of is even more obvious on SONAR...

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: They're getting frustrated.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: No. The only thing that can chase off a shark is... a larger shark. PING... PING... There, on the sonar, we now see a shape F TIMES LARGER than all the other shapes.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: It’s the Meg.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Get her out of there. PING... PING... It’s like watching a train coming at some  68.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: (mic, calmly) Fan, here we go. At your Six.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan turns inside the cylinder to the direction Mac told h She holds the spear gun tightly. Eerie silence. Her breathing the only sound besides Mac’s voice.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: (radio, calm) I’1l count it down for you... FAN'S POV - as she prepares to see the monster...

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: (radio, calm) Five... Four... FAN'S POV - Spear Gun ready...

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: (radio, calm) Three... Two... FAN’S POV - Where is it!?

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: (radio, calm) One... And... FAN'S POV - She sees nothing. SUDDENLY, she looks down as WHAM! The MEG, which had been swimming DEEPER than she expected, SLAMS into the DIVE CYLINDER from below! THE IMPACT IS MASSIVE. Sparks fly! FAN is tossed across t cylinder, knocked senseless. She recovers, tries to relocate the Meg. This time it com from directly in front. BAM! BAM! The Meg slides across t cylinder, impervious to the electricity. Now we see it li up in all its glory. A massive 35-foot wall of destructio SMASH! It knocks the cylinder completely HORIZONTAL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watching the MONITORS is disorienting, because everything being knocked around. Mac and the others see GLIMPSES of FAN... And then parts of the MEG...  69.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (loud) Come on, this is crazy, get her out of there!

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: (louder) The cage - will - not - break!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan steadies herself amidst the BASHING and the SWAYING. raises the SPEAR GUN and fires OFF THE PERFECT SHOT! The DART reaches the dorsal fin, but BOUNCES OFF harmless The Meg’s skin just too tough to penetrate. The MEG seems to take the shot personally because it come Fan more aggressively than ever - HITTING THE CYLINDER AN SCRAPING along it, creating a dazzling display of electri fire, before disappearing into the void once again. Fan has a moment to reload.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They realize she fired...

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Fan, did you hit it? Fan raises her hand - fist closed.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Missed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan floats, waiting, searching the blue for what seems li an eternity. Then the Meg pounces from the shadows...

dialogues.speaker: CHOMP DOWN ON THE CYLINDER
dialogues.text: The MEG tugs and pulls the CYLINDER back and forth, as if trying to free the ‘TOY’ from some imaginary ‘Master’s ha BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! There go all but one of the cameras.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GRRRRRRRIIIIIIINNNNNNDDDDDD.... What’s that sound? Jonas Dimitri race back outside.  70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What they see BOGGLES their minds. That GRRIIINNNDDD is t sound of the DIVE CABLE FORCIBLY UNSPOOLING from ITS MASS REEL. The Meg is pulling the Dive Cylinder Deeper a few feet at time. But that’s not the problem. The problem is... CREAK. All that tension is putting a strain on the reel a crane. Dimitri and Jonas both see it. Dimitri goes pale.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: You're right - the cage won't break... The crane will!

dialogues.speaker: ON JONAS
dialogues.text: As he gets an idea and goes racing off, leaving Dimitri, is now panicking and running back inside...

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: We have to get her out of there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MASSIVE JAWS surround Fan, desperately trying to snap up. The Dive Cylinder DEFORMS under the pressure, but doesn’t break, and it REBOUNDS to its normal shape any ti the MEG loosens its grip. SLAM - SLAM - SLAM - SLAM - The Meg resumes yanking it ba and forth, dragging it further and further down. Somehow FAN, who is being bounced around like a pinball, notices that there is less SCALY ARMOR on the UNDERSIDE o the Meg. She aims for what is an impossible shot... Pfffft.... It’s a hit! Right between the pectoral fins! F let’s out a celebratory yell that no one hears as the Meg YANKS HER CYLINDER DOWN harder than ever!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snap! Snap! The bolts at the base of the crane are literally being pulled from the deck. And then, there is final SHARP SNAP...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...A SNAP that coincides with the Meg’s SUDDEN RETREAT. F a moment, Fan is about to celebrate. Then she looks up towards the MOONLIT SURFACE above her...  71. At first she sees a SHADOW, then she is able to make out MASSIVE CRANE ARM hurtling towards her. The Meg has rippe it off the deck. The ARM will drag her to the bottom of t ocean, so she does the only thing she can, she opens the ESCAPE HATCH ON TOP OF THE DIVE CYLINDER... And she’s just clear of it when IT’S DRAGGED DOWN INTO TH DARKNESS... Fan finds herself floating, totally unprotected, 300 feet below the surface. It doesn’t get much scarier than that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The one CAMERA still working on the cage shows a view of above... And FAN’S CAMERA shows just how exposed she is.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: She blew the hatch! She’s in the water! She’s in the water!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RRRREEEVVVWV. That’s the sound of Dimitri firing up a ZOD he’s launched off the far side of the ship.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Hang on... Francois comes leaping into the Zodiac, manning the contr

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: I‘ll drive, you grab her. He SHOVES the DUAL THROTTLES forward to the stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan kicking for the moonlit surface, still a long way to Beneath her, in the dark, we see OCCASIONAL BURSTS OF ELECTRICITY as the MEG continues to attack the Dive Cylin There is a real rhythm to Meg’s strikes. We see LIGHT the dark. LIGHT then dark. But then LIGHT stops...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the Dive Cylinder now in free-fall. The MEG has ABANDONED it. No longer interested in the ‘Toy’...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There’s something tastier high up above.  72. EXT. OCEAN - FAN’S POV - 20 METERS DOWN She's breathing heavy. The promise of the surface so clos EXT. OCEAN - MEG’S POV The moving figure of FAN is getting larger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan explodes onto the surface, spits out her regulator, SCREAMS for help. EXT. OCEAN - MEG’S POV All it sees is FAN now. This is going to be delicious... .-.-Then SOMETHING comes plowing through FRAME from left right... ...we KNOW it’s the ZODIAC. But all the MEG knows is once this thing has passed... Fan has vanished.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan is coughing and breathless in Dimitri’s arms.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: I got the shot... Francois, piloting them back to the Mazu at full throttle shakes his head in amazement. Dimitri looks into Fan’s ey

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: Of course you did. Because you are the most bad-ass woman-- --Dimitri doesn’t get to finish that lovely thought becau suddenly ALL OF THEM ARE FLYING OUT OF CONTROL IN THE AIR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mac, Zhang and the others look on helplessly as THE MEG h smashed the Zodiac and now has three meals to choose from

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois is closest to the Zodiac, which has settled in t water upside down, so he swims for it while Dimitri and F race towards the Mazu.  73. Francois reaches the Zodiac and is about to climb on boar when SOMETHING knocks him from below - sending him back across the surface about ten feet. Francois’s face wrinkles. He’s in pain, but still mobile. He swims for the Zodiac and as he’s about to climb on -- KNOCKED back again.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: Are you playing with me?! Is that it?! He swims for the Zodiac a third time and MAKES IT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francois collapses flat on his back. Safe for the moment. Still waters. The only noise - his own heavy breathing. And then we hear the unmistakable sound of rushing water. Francois’ heavy breathing turns to laughter, as he takes moment, and enjoys the full moon as it hangs low in the s

dialogues.speaker: FRANCOIS
dialogues.text: I hope I give you indigestion. WHOOOOMMMMMPPPP - In a blur, the massive jaws of the Meg break the surface. The Meg clamps down. The Pressurized A in the ZODIAC EXPLODES and Francois’ blood sprays across blue skies before raining down like a fine mist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin prepares to lower another Zodiac. DJ sees that.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Suyin, that’s suicide.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Yeah. Now are you going to help or what?! DJ nods. Of course he’s going to help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dimitri and Fan keep swimming. Even after the echo of Francois’ scream fades. THEN THEY HEAR IT... Like a jet engine ripping across the water. It’s the DORS FIN of the Meg. Just barely breaking the surface, but  74. leaving a tremendous wake behind it, creating the visual effect of a giant invisible monster coming right for them

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: (stops swimming) You know that joke, you don’t have to be faster than the shark, you just have to be faster than me? But Fan can tell even if Dimitri sacrifices himself first won’t make a difference. So she stops too.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: He gets you, then he gets me. Let him get us together. They embrace, at least they wont die alone.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: I might love you.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: I'll take it. The sound of that dorsal is as loud as a JET-ENGINE on ta off now. It’s about to reach them...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the MEG opening its jaws, about to bite when... WHIIIISHHHHHH THHHUUUUUUD! Some kind of PROJECTILE on a chain SLAMS into the Meg’s side! REVEAL--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JONAS, in Suyin’s Abyss Glider, has FIRED THE PORT HORIZO ANCHOR (that we saw Suyin and DJ use earlier) INTO THE ME Jonas then inverts his Abyss Glider UPSIDE DOWN...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .»+-So that now the right ‘wing’ has a shot. He fires a SECOND ANCHOR into the beast’s side. These are fatal woun But not instantaneously fatal. And as the Abyss Glider an the shark are now linked twice, it means Jonas is about t in for a wild ride. We see the shark turn and twist...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas braces himself as the anchor chains go taut.  75.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: This is gonna hurt--

dialogues.speaker: WHIRL-SPIN-SMASH-BANG
dialogues.text: The Abyss Glider is violently accelerated and decelerated every direction. It’s like being on a roller coaster and bumper cars at the same time. With a touch of bull rider.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The good news is DJ AND SUYIN, in their Zodiac, reach DIM and FAN and pull them from the water.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: (indicates the ocean) Jonas. From the surface, they can see GLIMPSES - THROUGH THE DAR OCEAN WATERS - of the VIOLENT BALLET BELOW. The bloody ME twisting and turning. And the ABYSS GLIDER at its mercy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas, totally disoriented, blows the emergency BALLAST t just as he’s THROWN FROM his seat when his HARNESS BREAKS His head smashes against the cockpit. Knocking him out co

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO BLACK
dialogues.text: INT. SHIP’S INFIRMARY - MAZU - NIGHT A LIGHT shines into ‘our eyes’. Dr. HELLER is the source it... We are...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (weakly) Hey. Jonas rests on a bed, nursing the world’s worst headache. MEIYING holds his hand for comfort. SUYIN is with her, an MAC lurks unseen by Jonas off to the side, WORRIED.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: How long was I out, Doc?

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: A few minutes. Hopefully, it’s just a concussion, but we’re going to run a battery of tests once we get you back to the Mana One.  76. Now Jonas sees MAC. Makes eye contact with his friend.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Doc, I think I’m hallucinating. I see a monster behind you... Meiying starts to cackle.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Okay, he’s fine. Mac gives Jonas, ‘I’m glad you’re okay’ nod, before disappearing off screen. Jonas turns to Suyin:

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: What happened to the Meg?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mazu’s remaining CRANE ARM is HOISTING the DEAD MEG o of the water by its tail as DJ, FAN, and MORRIS look on.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: It’s spectacular...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mac sees the Meg coming up and then looks away, looks bac where DIMITRI is showing ZHANG PHOTOGRAPHS OF the SMASHED UNIS BOT that is partially wedged into the thermal vent.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: So we are the reason it could get through the thermocline. Dimitri nods.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: Based on where our BOTS were placed, I'd say that’s BOT 14.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Whacked into the side of that vent like a tennis ball.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: Not a tennis ball, a thumb. (Mac doesn’t understand) The Bot’s partially obstructing the flow of hot water out the vent - like a thumb over a garden hose - increasing the power of the water that does jet out...  77.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: ...Creating a warm water hole up through the thermocline. A hole we're going to have to close.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: As soon as we get back to the Mana- One, I can have the BOT self- destruct via remote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All 35-feet of the MEG is now out of the water. Its tail high in the air. Its once fearsome jaws now hovering a fe feet above the water. DJ and FAN sit side-by-side on folding chairs, just stari at the beast. The reverent silence is broken by...

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Will one of you take my picture? She holds out her camera phone. Is she for real? Finally, Fan relents.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Either of you want to join me?

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: I just had a meet and greet with that thing’s digestive tract, so I’m going to skip the photo op. Click - Fan takes the shot. She hands Morris her camera phone back. Morris realizes she may seem a tad insensitiv

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: It’s been an emotional day. But I want you both to remember, what you've done here is unprecedented. You're part of something truly historic. Morris walks back inside the ship. Once she’s gone--

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Is it just me, or were there actual dollar signs in her eyes? Fan chuckles. DJ is stoic.

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: “Hey guys, how long do you think it would it take to train a Megaladon (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: to do water ballet” (shakes her head) I swear, if she comes back with a saddle, I’m going home. DJ nods vacantly. Not really listening to her.

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What’s wrong?

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Remember the last time we played poker? Remember what happened?

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: People focus too much on results...

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: I cleaned you out. Because you have the world’s worst poker face. Now what is wrong?

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: (beat) That’s not the same Meg. INTERCUT - INT. SHIP’S INFIRMARY - MAZU - DAY Where Jonas has just told Suyin a similar thought.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: What do you mean, that’s not the same Meg? Jonas tries to sit up, but he’s too dizzy.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: How big is it? Thirty feet?

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Thirty-five.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: The one we saw below. The one that killed Junjie, Carl, and Luc. It was twice that size. You said so yourself.  79.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: You think there are two Megs? My father was surprised even one followed DJ’s trail because--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (a step ahead of her) --Because sharks are territorial, he’s right. Assuming Megs behave like other sharks, it should have stayed down there. Unless... (she waits for it) Mature sharks don’t go exploring new ground, they stay where they know the food is. Juveniles on the other hand... ON SUYIN - as she grasps the meaning of what Jonas is say

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ and Fan continue to debate.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Fan, I’m telling you, it didn’t look bigger, it was bigger...

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: And DJ, I’m telling you, as someone who curled up inside that thing’s mouth, I can say with all confidence, that is the Meg. SUYIN arrives and heads straight for the Meg.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Suyin, settle something for us... But Suyin doesn’t even acknowledge them, she’s so focused RAIDING a SUPPLY chest - grabbing a HARNESS, a BLOWTORCH, some EYE PROTECTION.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Suyin? Suyin climbs halfway up the CRANE, attaches her HARNESS, REPELS down the side of the MEG. She reaches into the mou GRABS ON, and then pulls herself up and INSIDE the carcas INT. MEG’S MOUTH / EXT. MAZU - CONTINUED The darkness disappears as Suyin sparks up her blowtorch.  80.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin’s operation attracts the attention of MORRIS, who c running back in--

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, what are you doing? We're going to want that thing to look perfect! SLIDE - That’s the sound that a MEG’S TOOTH, now liberate from the jaw, makes as it SKIDS across the deck and stops FAN'S FEET. As Fan bends down to pick it up... ...-Suyin pushes off the side of the shark, SWINGS out ov the ocean, and then back towards the deck. She RELEASES t harness and lands in a trot towards her friends as MORRIS annoyed, rushes over to the Meg to inspect the damage.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What were you thinking?! FAN now has the tooth in her hands. She uses the ruler on her iPhone to measure the size. Then her face goes pale. She looks at SUYIN. Suyin nods.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: (realizes) This is a baby.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: And the one below, wasn’t. So... The women exchange a look. Fan almost dizzy from the news

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Can one of you translate please?

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: This Megaladon’s teeth are 8 cm. 8 cm means this monster is actually just a kid. Maybe 6 months old.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: And while sharks aren’t very loving, mothers usually stay close to their offspring for the first year. MORRIS, who is right at the ship’s edge, and had been mourning the damage done to her prize, suddenly BRIGHTENS like it’s Christmas morning.  81.

dialogues.speaker: MORRIS
dialogues.text: (excited) Wait are you saying there’s a bigger Meg? THE ANSWER -- COMES IN HORRIFYING SCALE AND VIOLENCE. As suddenly the OCEAN BEHIND THE MAZU EXPLODES. THE ‘MOMMA’ MEGALADON comes flying out of the water at a sideways angle. She’s so massive that her arrival BLOCKS THE SUN, ECLIPSING THE MAZU, as her MIGHTY JAWS SNATCH th smaller Meg that was once her child but is now her meal. MORRIS’S POV -- All she sees is Shark. It would be her dr come true except for the fact that-- THOOMP! The MEG takes Morris with it as it DISAPPEARS int the sea!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But not before... SMASH...! Its MASSIVE TAIL crashes thro the AFT DECK of the Mazu with SUCH FORCE that the ship PITCHES NOSE UP INTO THE AIR before SLAMMING BACK DOWN. DJ’S POV - FOR A MOMENT - THINGS ARE DISORIENTING. There’ NO SOUND, vision is BLURRY... Then, when the SOUND comes it’s FILLED WITH DEAFENING SIRENS. And when VISION is restored, we see part of the aft deck is gone completely. Fan and Suyin, both having nearly fallen into the sea, re their feet. Fan looks around for Morris.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Is she...? Suyin shakes her head. Morris is gone. And the ship is starting to sink. The two women collect DJ, who can only process what’s happened though gallows humor.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: That settles the bigger Meg debate. INT. SHIP’S INFIRMARY - MAZU - MOMENTS LATER Jonas, having been tossed like a rag doll gets to his fee

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (to Meiying) Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: What’s happening?!

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: We've gotta get out of here.  82.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MAC runs through a gauntlet of FLASHING LIGHTS towards th engine room. He runs into DIMITRI, who is just coming fro there. They have to YELL over the siren to be heard.

dialogues.speaker: THE PROPS ARE GONE, BOTH ENGINES
dialogues.text: ARE BLOWN AND WE’VE GOT NO RUDDER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas and Meiying run into DJ, Fan and...

dialogues.speaker: MOMMY
dialogues.text: SUYIN embraces her daughter as MAC and DIMITRI run up.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: How bad is it? Mac shakes his head. We’re going down. Off their looks:

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: It’s not all bad news. Since we already took off non-essential personnel, we have enough Zodiacs for all of us.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Zodiacs?! With that thing out there, are you nuts?

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: We still have the two subs.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: (shakes his head) Lost them with the aft deck.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: We need that helicopter. ZHANG arrives as if on cue, and he has good news.  83.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: I already radioed them. They’re three minutes out. Finally, a break.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ENTIRE GROUP waits at the THRESHOLD OF THE HATCH that leads outside to the HELIPAD. The Mazu is now LISTING 15 DEGREES TO STARBOARD. And the HELICOPTER, which they can approaching, has WHEELS for landing gear. This means:

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: We're listing too much for them to land safely. They’re going to have to use the basket - take us up one at time.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: How long will that take?! Mac looks Jonas - hopefully not too long.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the belly of the Helicopter, the CO-PILOT finishes rig A RESCUE BASKET to the winch. He nods to the THIRD AIRMAN it’s ready. The Third Airman SLIDES THE SIDE DOOR OPEN. Now it’s incredibly loud in here. The THIRD AIRMAN and th PILOT push the BASKET out. It FALLS a few feet before the rope catches. Then the CO-PILOT turns on the WINCH. The line unspools and the basket drops slowly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas can see the basket now...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Okay, it’s coming. Suyin, holding Meiying, will go first. As they wait next Jonas, he can tell the little girl is terrified.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Have you got your dolphin on? (off her nod) Then you’re going to be okay.

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: Jonas, you know that’s just a superstition, right?  84. He laughs. Smiles at her. Then motions them to wait a few more seconds. They watch the BASKET - getting closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MEG’S POV - From DOWN HERE the sky looks white. And we ca see the dark shape of the Mazu, which is too big to eat.. Then there is the Helicopter which is too high in the sky But then there is that BASKET, dangling there, like a tre

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Third Airmen, looking down, judges the distance from BASKET to the deck. It’s nearly there.

dialogues.speaker: THIRD AIRMEN
dialogues.text: Looking good... He turns back for a moment, so he doesn’t see what WE SEE IN SLOW MOTION —- WITH ONLY SELECTED SOUNDS PIERCING THE SILENCE...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MEG is coming straight at the surface, about to breac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas is outside with Suyin and Meiying when THEY SEE THE SOARING INTO THE SKY. Our first look at the beast in ALL IMPOSSIBLE GLORY. 70 feet long and 100 tons - yet it arcs through the air gracefully to snatch THE BASKET. JONAS -- turns and grabs Suyin/Meiying. We HEAR his ‘GET BACK!!' as he drives them inside the ship while... BEHIND JONAS -- the MEG PIVOTS around its meal, its head turning back seaward as its TAIL carries on towards the s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear, distant and hollow, the sound of the pilot screa to no one. ‘POWER!... POWER!... POWER...!’

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MEG, basket in mouth, begins to drag the Helicopter d But then we hear a snap as, thankfully, the line breaks. the plunging Helicopter arrests its fatal descent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The PILOT breaks into a smile. We hear the joy in his distant, hollow sounding voice - ”“WE’RE GONNA MAKE IT!”.  85. Then the MEG’S TAIL rises into FRAME outside the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Oh sh--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMASH! The Tail of the Meg SLAMS INTO THE HELICOPTER, sending the Helicopter careening into the Mazu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas pulls the HATCH shut as -- BA-BLAM! -- The Helicopt EXPLODES with tremendous force and a noise so deafening t after it’s over, our group is surprised to be unhurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas opens the HATCH to see if there are any survivors. But the deck is just filled with burning debris.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (long beat, to Mac) How many Zodiacs do we have?

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: The Mazu is listing badly, soon it will roll over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THREE EMPTY ZODIACS float, tied to the deck. TWO are full sized. ONE is smaller. As everyone prepares to board, MAC raises a pair of binoculars/laser ranger finder to his ey

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH THE RANGE FINGER
dialogues.text: The Mana-One looks huge at this magnification. And the DISTANCE, per the little red digital read out, is...

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: 1 and 1/4 miles.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: So about five minutes. Looks are exchanged among the group. That’s not a lot of time. And yet, why does it feel like an eternity?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Does anyone see the Meg?  86. ZHANG looks at his watch, he’d set his timer.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Not for almost seven minutes now. It’s now or never. The group jumps in quickly... BOAT 1 - has DJ, MAC, and FAN BOAT 2 - has JONAS, SUYIN, MEIYING and ZHANG BOAT 3 - (the smaller one) - has DIMITRI and HELLER. Before they fire up their engines, Zhang reminds them:

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: Predatory instinct is to look for the weak link. If we stay together, we have a better chance of all of us making it. (exhales ) I just want to say... ..-but words fail him then. He feels responsible for ever person out here and that is weighing on him.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: You can finish that on the platform. Because we’re all making it and that’s an order.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: (scans the horizon) Looks clear. Three boats, Nine people, Eighteen eyes all search for th foot beast. But the ocean is calm. They have a chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The THREE ZODIACS bound across the sea. At this speed, th WIND, ENGINES, and SEA SPRAY combine in a sensory overloa THE BOATS stay close together. The three pilots: JONAS, DIMITRI, and MAC do an excellent job staying in formation VARIOUS POV’S - OF THE WATER Everyone has a moment where they think they see it. There off to the left... No, behind us on the right... A passin clump of SEAWEED nearly gives DJ a heart-attack.  87. BUT THE TRUTH IS -- There is no sign of the Meg.

dialogues.speaker: CLOSE-UPS
dialogues.text: JONAS keeps his eyes fixed on the Mana-One. SUYIN holds MEIYING close. ZHANG whispers a prayer. The seas are clear. MAC scans the horizon, DJ eyes the floor. FAN looks two boats across at DIMITRI. The seas still clear DIMITRI eyes the gauges. And HELLER... Heller allows himself the first hint of a SMILE...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MASSIVE DORSAL FIN is circling the sinking MAZU about 1 mile behind them.

dialogues.speaker: THEY ALL WATCH
dialogues.text: As the DORSAL FIN moves languidly, in profile, perpendicu to the Zodiacs, seemingly disinterested. And for a moment it really seems as if the Meg doesn’t care about them.

dialogues.speaker: BUT THEN THE DORSAL FIN TURNS
dialogues.text: Straight for them. A wake grows as the Meg ACCELERATES, a the fin sinks low in the water as its speed builds.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (calls to other boats)

dialogues.speaker: STAY TOGETHER
dialogues.text: THE MEG’S SPEED is breath-taking. It becomes clear...

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: It’s going to reach us before we make it to the platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Speeding along with the MEG as it closes in fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ sees that the Meg is angling for their boat or Suyin’s  88.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: I’M GOING AS FAST AS I CAN!

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (distant, faint) Stay together...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HELLER watches, horrified, as it becomes clear the MEG is going to take down one of the other two boats.

dialogues.speaker: DIMITRI
dialogues.text: (not aware of that) WE’RE HALFWAY THERE! When he hears nothing in response, DIMITRI GLANCES BACK. sees the MEG is going for Boat 1 or Boat 2. He looks at F in Boat 1... And the fear of losing her grips him.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (distant, faint) Stay together...

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: To his credit, may not have a loved one on those boats, b he can tell his partner does. He can also do the math. Th are only two people in this boat. It is a logical sacrifi

dialogues.speaker: HELLER
dialogues.text: (to Dimitri) He’s wrong. If we stay together, the MEG will get two of us before we make the platform. But if one boat peels off and leads it away... DIMITRI processes what Heller is suggesting. He nods at Heller and Heller nods back. It’s agreed. We’1ll do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JONAS sees HELLER looking his way. Heller gives hima salute. It’s both an apology and a goodbye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FAN sees Dimitri staring at her. Like he’s looking at her for the last time. And then she knows at once.  89.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DIMITRI turns the wheel and angles off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the others react to the sacrifice. Zhang looks at the with pure admiration and heartbreaking guilt. Fan’s I lov you’s are heard only by the wind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dimitri begins a wide, sweeping turn, which DRAWS the MEG off. He brings the ZODIAC to a heading that eventually is almost directly away from the other boats. HEAVEN’S POV From up here, we see the geography of the sacrifice, as ZODIACS 1 and 2 are now separating from the MEG and ZODIA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two men stand side by side, looking straight ahead, n seeing the death that bears down on them from behind. They face the sun, they face the light. They can HEAR the Meg behind them now. Then the sun GROWS IMPOSSIBLY WHITE-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin angles Meiying away so she doesn’t see the EXPLOSIO WATER in the distance. There’s nothing too graphic about And no screams can be heard. Just a giant burst of water then a terrible SILENCE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan buries her head in her hands, sobbing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas catches Suyin’s tear soaked eyes; one thing that gi him great solace is that the MEG is too far away to be a threat now. To either boat.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: We're going to make it. We're both going to make it.  90.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zodiacs PASS BY CAMERA, heading for the sanctuary of ONE. And we FADE...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a moment there is no SOUND... Just IMAGES... A HAND along the back of Dimitri’s chair, which still bar the IMPRINT of Dimitri’s back.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (FAINT, DISTANT)
dialogues.text: Fan... FINGERS tracing some DESIGN DOODLES that Dimitri had been scribbling...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (FAINT, DISTANT)
dialogues.text: Fan... Finally stopping on a QUICK SKETCH Dimitri made of Fan herself, when she wasn’t looking.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Fan? Are you going to be okay? Because we need you. Before she can answer, Fan feels a TUG at her side. MEIYI is there, offering her a sip of her SODA. Fan touches Meiying’s cheek: ‘No, but thanks.’

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: (to Suyin) I’m good.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Ping Bot 14 and see if it responds. We need to close that hole in the thermocline. ON MEIYING - watching as FAN and SUYIN go to work. Then turning to see JONAS, MAC and DJ in a heated conversation Meiying exhales. Not interested in either talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ding. The elevator opens and MEIYING steps out into the a glass world of the O-LEVEL.  91. She walks forward, drawn by something she sees IN THE OCE beyond the RIM of the structure. She reaches the end, extends her hands, her fingers tracing the glass. A HUMPBACK WHALE rolls gracefully onto its belly, its NEW CALF close to its side. Meiying smiles.

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (PRE-LAP)
dialogues.text: Internal cooling off... Pressure regulators shut down...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TACTICAL DISPLAY showing data from BOT 14 begins to f red. Fan's fingers fly across the keyboard--

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: ...-Bot self-destruct in 10. 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM!! Bot 14 explodes with a flash. Its pieces jetted upward by the power of the THERMAL VENT, then scattered. The TELL TALE COLUMN OF SUPER-HEATED WATER, which had stretched upwards like a TRANSLUCENT elevator shaft, DISAPPEARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan turns to Suyin, Mac, DJ and Jonas. She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: The hole is gone.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: So nothing else can get up here.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Yeah, but that also means what came up is staying up.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: The Meg was never going back down. Where it came from it was just another part of the food chain. Maybe not even the baddest thing on the block. But up here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meiying, face pressed against the glass, delights in watc the Whales.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound 92.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Up here, she’s the apex predator, with no natural enemies, and an unlimited supply of food.

dialogues.speaker: CONTROL CENTER
dialogues.text: of the DOOR. A frustrated Dr. Zhang enters.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: The Navy is sending a helicopter for us, ETA 40 minutes.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: What about the Meg?

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: They're running my request for military support up the line, but it’s not like they have a protocol to deal with this--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: --Because they don’t believe it. The reality of that hangs there. Suyin shakes her head--

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Well, they’re about to... She indicates the waters NORTH of HAINAN ISLAND on the ma --SLAM. SUYIN (CONT’D) Half the fishing fleet is working these waters. That’s fifty, sixty boats. And the Meg is gonna tear right through them. After that comes 30,000 tourists on the beaches at Sanya Bay-- The DCC is rocked by an IMPACT. Something has hit them. Reflexively, Fan pulls up CAMERA FEEDS of THE WATER SURROUNDING THE MANA-ONE. That something is the MEG.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Looks like she’s got some unfinished business first. Several MONITORS now show various angles of the massive b rushing the Mana-One.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Hang on!  93. --SLAM! THIS IMPACT is stronger. An EXPLOSION of concussi force that triggers A DEAFENING CACOPHONY OF ALARMS--

dialogues.speaker: WATER AT D-LEVEL, F-LEVEL, J-LEVEL--
dialogues.text: SUYIN turns to check on Meiying -- only to realize her daughter isn’t there.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: Meiying! --SLAM! This THIRD IMPACT is THE KNOCK-OUT PUNCH. One by one, every system shuts down: THUNK - THUNK - THUNK - THU And they are plunged into TOTAL DARKNESS.

dialogues.speaker: EXT/INT. OBSERVATION LEVEL, (O-LEVEL)
dialogues.text: We're looking in at Meiying from outside the glass. Behin her, the lights go out, but she doesn’t notice because sh TRANSFIXED by what’s unfolding in front of her. IN THE REFLECTION OF THE GLASS, we can see the two whales The Mother Whale is being shaken violently. REVEAL - the MEG has the whale in her jaws and is ripping to pieces. It’s a staggering demonstration of the true po of this beast - now unleashed in our world. As blood POUR from the dying whale, the sea becomes a THICK RED FOG--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALARMS still screaming. SUYIN (with JONAS) JABS repeatedl at the elevator button, but it won’t work until--

dialogues.speaker: EMERGENCY POWER
dialogues.text: DARKNESS is replaced by eerie RED LIGHTING and -- DING th ELEVATOR DOORS OPEN. As Jonas and Suyin head down to get Meiying, Fan checks the damage control screen.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: How bad is it?

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Worse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meiying stares out at the thick red fog (blood). Then, it begins to clear in front of her. Revealing A BLACK HOLE.  94. Ding. JONAS AND SUYIN arrive. And what they see causes their hearts to skip a beat. That’s not a BLACK HOLE... IT’S THE MEG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MEG hovers in the current, its side abutting the O-le its MASSIVE EYE inches away from Suyin’s little girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a beat, no one dares move. Then the EYE darts away--

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, GO
dialogues.text: SUYIN races down the glass ‘spoke’ to save her daughter w the MEG makes a 270-degree turn and comes at Meiying head Jaws opening...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin grabs Meiying and dives laterally, running along th rim of the station just as -- SMASH -- the MEG hits! It obliterates the place where Meiying just stood, and destr THAT ENTIRE CORRIDOR/SPOKE, as if it were made of smoke.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOMATIC PRESSURE DOORS
dialogues.text: Seal off the O-level where that SPOKE used to be as SMASH SMASH - the MEG takes out TWO MORE SPOKES - plowing throu them sideways - before diving away.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (watching the Meg) IT’S COMING AROUND!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin and Meiying reach the next intact ‘spoke’ - turn - sprint for the elevator. Suyin can see the MEG coming at them from directly below. They aren’t going to make it.

dialogues.speaker: IN SLOW-MOTION
dialogues.text: Suyin LEAPS into the air and THROWS her daughter forward, the CORRIDOR beneath them SHATTERS from the Meg’s impact. Still airborne, Meiying and Suyin suddenly collide with JONAS, sliding into frame so as to CATCH MEIYING and PULL SUYIN through the--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which SNAP SHUT just after they’re all safely on the elev side.

dialogues.speaker: RESUME
dialogues.text: SLAM! The Meg obliterates Spoke 4 -- and Jonas, Suyin, an Meiying FALL BACKWARDS into the ELEVATOR as its doors clo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone has been knocked to the floor. ELECTRICAL ARCS spark around them. WATER jets through SEAMS IN THE WALLS. FAN struggles to her knees and finds herself looking at MEIYING’S SODA CAN as it is CRUSHED by an invisible hand!

dialogues.speaker: DR. ZHANG
dialogues.text: Plastic bottles of water collapse in on themselves. Plasm screens explode as if hit by unseen hammers. Zhang looks at the INTERNAL PRESSURE GAUGES. They are sky rocketing into the RED. Heading for fatal levels fast.

dialogues.speaker: HAVE TO GET TOPSIDE, NOW--
dialogues.text: Ding -- JONAS, SUYIN, and MEIYING arrive in the Elevator.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Going up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It’s a long ride to the top. Anxious silence until... SCRAAAAAAYYYY... They begin to hear a TERRIBLE SOUND. A sound that grows LOUDER as they reach the top deck and th doors OPEN on to--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --A sight out of Dante. Black SMOKE swirls in the wind. FIRES burn across the deck. And that SCRAAAAYYYY - is the MANA-ONE'’s LOADING CRANE as it comes CRASHING to the dec SMASH! - the crane hits just a few feet in front them! Wh the dust clears, the group take stock of their situation.  96. ON JONAS - as he stares at the fallen CRANE. Something ab it triggers an idea in his mind... He starts to think...

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: How long before that helicopter gets here!?

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: 30 minutes. ON JONAS - STILL THINKING - It’s just an ordinary crane.. Ordinary construction crane... Construction...

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: 30 minutes? This thing will be at the bottom of the ocean in 30 minutes! ON JONAS - As the idea snaps into place.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: It’s enough time.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: For what?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: For us to kill that Meg.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: (lights up) Now we're talking. But the rest of the team stare at him. Kill the Meg?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Even if rescue gets here for us, that doesn’t help the fishing boats, or the tourists. Like it or not, we’re the ones responsible for this. So I’m not going anywhere until that thing’s dead -- or I am. ON ZHANG - as he looks at Jonas. And then nods.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: What do have you in mind?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peace, tranquility... THEN WE SEE SOMETHING FALLING TOWAR US... Is it TWO ASTRONAUTS IN SPACE SUITS...?  97. SPLASH! --- No, it’s JONAS and SUYIN, each in DEEP-SEA DIVING SUITS, with WEIGHT BELTS that allow them to drop a fast sky divers, and RECOVERY WIRES hooked to their suits

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas begins to outline his plan.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: When you built this platform, you set the foundation in bedrock. Which means explosives. Still have any?

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: We do, but they’re in an underwater bunker near the base of the station. It’s 300 meters down. Jonas nods. 300 meters down. That won’t be a problem...

dialogues.speaker: JUMP FORWARD TO
dialogues.text: JONAS AND SUYIN’S POVS - FROM INSIDE THE SUITS We're along for a TERRIFYING, TURBULENT, and CLAUSTROPHOB ride. Outside sounds are muted - while our own breathing seems amplified. OUR FIELD OF VIEW is limited to what’s directly in front of us. We can just make out, to one sid the SUPERSTRUCTURE of the Mana-One as we drop down along rapidly. Very rapidly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas continues...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: This all started with the BOTs. The Meg was drawn to them as soon as you turned them on. So Suyin and I will go down to that bunker. We’1l get explosives and rig a bomb. DJ, Fan, you two bring down a BOT. Then, we connect the bomb to the Bot, turn it on, and -

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: --Boom - end of story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JONAS AND SUYIN’S POVS - FROM INSIDE THE SUITS The TERROR RIDE continues. It’s like driving flat out through the fog, hoping you don’t hit something. FISH AND AQUATIC LIFE rush up at us, seemingly out of nowhere!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ shakes his head. There’s a problem.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Jonas, that crane was our last chance of getting a BOT down there. The Meg already took out all our subs. We've got nothing. Jonas is caught. That’s a deal-breaker.

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Actually there is something. An unmanned prototype Dimitri was working on. It’s small, but powerful enough to take a Bot.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Since when was Dimitri interested in unmanned subs?

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: Since the day you tried to ask me out. That hangs there a beat. All of them caught. A moment of humanity. Of levity at DJ’s expense. They all needed that

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Okay people, let’s get to work!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JONAS and SUYIN whizz by, like two base jumpers, dropping along the Mana-One.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone disperses to start the plan. Jonas holds Mac bac  99.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: None of this works if you don’t get power back to the main line. There’s a reason Jonas saved this for last. It’s impossib

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: Jonas, I don’t know if this Meg can read a blueprint, but she managed to take out all our generators. (shakes his head) Dimitri is who we need.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: You’re who we've got. Mac shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: I can’t tell if this plan is crazy, or stupid.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Only one way to find out. Off their smiles...

dialogues.speaker: ON JONAS
dialogues.text: A matching smile on Jonas’s face as his breakneck descent continues. A smile that EXPLODES INTO AGONY WHEN--SNAAAP!

dialogues.speaker: AAAARRRRRRRGGGGHHHHH
dialogues.text: Jonas’s descent is STOPPED ABRUPTLY, causing him to cry o as Suyin DISAPPEARS into the waters below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zhang, who is standing the TWO SPOOLS OF WIRE attached to their suits, sees Jonas’s wire has stopped dead.

dialogues.speaker: SOMETHING HAPPENED TO JONAS
dialogues.text: JONAS’S POV - FROM INSIDE HIS SUIT His breathing labored, Jonas shakes off the pain and look up. His LINE got SNAGGED on part of the MANA-ONE.  100.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: I’m okay. But my recovery line is all tangled up in the platform. SUYIN’S POV - RAPIDLY APPROACHING THE BOTTOM She's at 300 meters and the sea floor is rushing towards

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Floor in sight, Weight belt released...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin hits the QUICK RELEASE ON HER WEIGHT BELT, freeing from the dropping mass of lead. The BELT continues on rapidly, STRIKING the sandy bottom like a meteor... But Suyin SLOWS RAPIDLY, and by the time she reaches the bottom, her momentum is dissipated by one forward roll. S LOOKS UP for Jonas and sees him, dangling high up there, some toy on a string, totally defenseless. EXT. OCEAN / INT. SUIT - JONAS’S POV Jonas begins to saw at the line his trusty knife.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: I’m cutting free.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: How do we get you back to the surface?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: One problem at a time. At least this won’t take very long, the WIRE begins to fr quickly. SNAP!... SNAP!... He’s free and begins to fall--

dialogues.speaker: --WAIT, JONAS DON'T
dialogues.text: Reflexively, Jonas grabs for the wire and catches it. But he’s holding his entire weight, and that of the belt, by gloved hand. And his grip is slipping, fast.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: It’s passing right beneath you.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS LOOKS DOWN
dialogues.text: The MEG’s size, compared to Jonas’s, is almost comical. I like a COMMERCIAL AIRPLANE is passing 10 feet beneath him  101.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS LOOKS UP
dialogues.text: His GLOVED HAND can’t maintain a grip on the wire. He watches the line slip from his fingers... And then...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS DROPS
dialogues.text: Just as the MEG finishes passing though! WHOOOSH - it’s s close that JONAS can feel the heat of MEG’S massive tail it swipes, lethally, just inches from him his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin watches as Jonas approaches. Like her, he ditches t weight belt with about 15 meters to go, then slows himsel make a soft landing. Suyin stares at him.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Let’s get to the bunker. Because I really want to blow that thing up.

dialogues.speaker: INT/EXT. MANA ONE
dialogues.text: The central power station is located one floor below the deck, and the stairwell to it has collapsed, meaning MAC to CRAWL down the twisted remains of the staircase... Then CRAWL across the top of the power station... Then RE off its side, dangling out over the water, so he can do t repairs there. Mac looks down at a Medusa’s hair tangle o ELECTRICAL wires, half of which are hanging in the WATER.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: What could go wrong here? As soon as he says that, WHAM! The MEG RAMS the station ( screen) causing this ENTIRE PLATFORM TO DROP FIVE FEET CL TO THE SEA before finally catching. Mac’s adrenaline spik

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: (to the universe) That was a rhetorical question! WHAM! The MEG hits the station again...  102.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ..-Rattling the entire Mana-one as the CAMERA now FOLLOWS BEHIND DJ AND FAN -- as they RUN down a partially-flooded industrial hallway, with only DJ's FLASHLIGHT guiding the

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Is it me, or does it seem like she’s getting more pissed off?

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: She can join the club. DJ darts around a corner, FAN on his heels as... WHAM! The MEG hits again and suddenly DAYLIGHT replaces darkness as the entire hallway in front of them DISAPPEAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MEG has taken out the SKYWAY connecting the north sid the Mana-One to the south side. And it’s done that just a DJ was leading Fan onto that skyway at break-neck speed! DJ watches/feels as the corridor around him seems to vani and suddenly he’s in mid-air, about to drop into the leth waters below. For a moment, time stands still... Then a hand reaches into frame and--

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: I GOT YoU! FAN pulls him back from certain death using every last bi energy she’s got. The two of them fall back into the safe of what’s left of the skyway. For a moment, neither can d anything but breathe. Finally, they get to their feet. And DJ looks straight in the eyes of the woman who just saved his life.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Just so we’re clear, I wasn’t asking you out. I was being polite because you were new here. Fan stares at him. About to nail him with a clever rejoin when -- WOOOOSH -- DJ vanishes. FALLING into the ocean as more of the skyway collapses. Fan can only watch him go..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the churning water, we see DJ falling backwards i the sea. His IMPACT SPLASH rings out like a dinner bell.  103.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ surfaces and finds himself surrounded by large chunks floating DEBRIS. He looks for something big enough to protect him from the shark, but then realizes that’s futi So he looks up at the Mana-One. He has NO WAY of climbing back up on the South side, where Fan is. His only choice to swim the 50 meters the skyway used to span and reach t North Side, where the DIVE PLATFORM sits at just above wa level. A safe haven. If he can get there. DJ is about to swim for it when--

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: DJ. Don’t. Move. He looks up at Fan. He’s never seen her so scared in her life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EXT. MANA-ONE - FAN’S POV Now we see why. THE MEG is just a few meters beneath the surface of the water, DIRECTLY UNDER DJ, studying him. ON DJ - as he begins to hyperventilate from fear. He has fight the urge to move. An urge coming from every cell in his body. ON FAN - she stares directly into his eyes, trying to kee him centered. Keep looking at me. Relax. Just relax. ON DJ - trying not to cry out as the MEG’S MASSIVE NOSE lazily brushes him. As if to see - is this just a piece o debris, or should I eat it...?

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: You're OK. You’re Ok. DJ looks up at her - easy for her to say! Then suddenly D is BLINDED BY A BEAM OF LIGHT. What the?! It’s his flashlight. The nudge from the Meg liberated it from DJ's pocket, it’s about to fall in the water, and it still on!

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Oh no... ON THE FLASHLIGHT as it leaves the confines of DJ’s pocke and begins to sink. DJ knows if he grabs for it, the MEG will devour him. So he remains motionless. Helpless to st the flashlight’s fall.  104.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The flashlight TUMBLES end over end - down past the massi creature - which takes no notice of such a tiny spec. But then, like an undersea spotlight, the flashlight’s be sweeps the eyes of the MEG, before disappearing below. The MEG, triggered, follows it into the depths.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As DJ waits for death, FAN realizes the MEG has vanished. But where is it...? WHAM! The answer nearly sends Fan into the ocean herself. The MEG has moved off, and decided to strike one of the T ZODIACS tied up at the dock. It takes half the dock with The bad news is - with the dock damaged - that part of th station begins to take on water. The good news is - all t is happening a good distance away from where DJ is!

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: DJ! Go! Gol DJ, amazed to still be alive, SWIMS as fast as he can...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ manages only a few strokes BEFORE THE MEG’S DORSAL FIN STOPS in the water, like it just figured out it’s been du It violently spins around and heads straight for DJ, cutt through the ocean like a Miter saw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDER - on DJ as he pushes forward. Over his shoulder, we begin to see the massive dorsal fin, rising into frame as gets closer. If DJ looks back, he’s dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TRAILER SHOT - The tiny silhouette of the man... And th incredible scale of the monster that’s about to catch him

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON DJ - Head down. Desperate. CLOSE ON THE MEG - mouth opening wide for feeding...  105.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In one fluid motion, DJ swings himself up onto the deck, rolls as far away from the water as he can get so when -- SLAM -- THE MEG RAMS THE SIDE OF THE LOADING AREA -- he remains safely out of reach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan lets a scram of celebration. He made it. He made it!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ, lying flat on his back, speaks to Fan via his ear- piece/mic.

dialogues.speaker: DJ, (MIC)
dialogues.text: You might want to take the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON - A PAIR OF HANDS - as they stack small SEMTEX PLASTIQUE (explosive) BRICKS into the shape of a Mayan pyramid. CLOSE ON - THE SAME HANDS - now securing the pyramid with strategic strips of duct tape. CLOSE ON - THE SAME HANDS - as they connect a small IMPAC PLATE TO THE TOP of the creation. PULL BACK TO REVEAL - Suyin watching Jonas finish his wor

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (off her look) My ex-wife always said I was good at blowing things up. Jonas and Suyin load the bomb into a BACKPACK. Bomb safel inside, Jonas zips up the pack before Suyin carefully put on his back. She waits for him to start walking.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: (I have a bomb on my back) You should go in front of me. Suyin nods, good point. As she starts for the Air-Lock, SOMETHING ON THE SUPPLY SHELF catches Jonas’s eye. Hand Flares. He thinks a moment. Then takes two.  106.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: How’s it going up there, Mac?

dialogues.speaker: INT/EXT. MANA ONE
dialogues.text: MAC'S SWEAT DRENCHED EYES focus on the breaker panel with eager anticipation. He slams down the central switch and...BOOM!!! An explosion of sparks sends him reeling an almost off the edge of the power station. He’s blown the fuse board.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Oh, it’s going great. He opens up the BOARD and begins to remove a fuse with hi FINGERS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While FAN’S FINGERS FLY across the keys of a LAPTOP. ON SCREEN we see: RSV-NAVIGATION CONTROLS - LINKING... LINKING... CONNECTED. BEGIN POWER UP SEQUENCE... Machine-sounds begin to fill the air behind Fan. Their source, THE UNMANNED SUBMERSIBLE, comes into view as DJ brings it out of Dimitri’s lab, pulling it along an overh conveyor belt.

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Jonas, we're one minute to launch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas and Suyin, just visible in the gloaming, walk clear the storage facility and look up at the DARK MANA-ONE.

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Camera range is limited. So you’ll have to guide me when I get close.

dialogues.speaker: INT MANA ONE
dialogues.text: Mac is now at the main control board for the entire power station. FLIP - FLIP - FLIP... He powers up the Main Bus, and for a moment it looks like it will work until- BOOM! Again. Something goes wrong. This time forcing MAC to duck down for cover UNDER THE DESK.  107. While down there he sees an OPEN DRAWER. In it, is a smal box labeled, “in case of emergency”. He opens the box and finds a bottle of 1942 Don Julio tequila. He stares at it

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: RSV launched...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE UNMANNED SUB descends RIGHT AT US... It passes by CAMERA... It’s TOW-LINE growing taut...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ watches as a BOT now follows the sub into the depths below. Next to him, FAN works the sub’s controls, which a linked to a LAPTOP that gives her a view from its NOSE CA

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Bot clear and coming down to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas and Suyin, standing there like decorations in an aquarium, exposed and doing their best to stay motionless

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Any sign of our friend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zhang scans the water around the platform.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG, (MIC)
dialogues.text: She’s not up here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON THE MONITOR - showing the way ahead for the submersible. CLOSE ON FAN’S THUMBS - as she adjusts for currents. CLOSE ON THE DEPTH READ-OUT - now clicking past 150 meter

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like tumbleweeds blowing across a ghost town at high-noon STRANGE CLUMPS of PLANT LIFE roll by JONAS and SUYIN’S FE

dialogues.speaker: FAN, (RADIO - STATIC)
dialogues.text: That’s 150. You should see it any second now...  108. JONAS AND SUYIN - STRAINING THEIR EYES to look above them But it’s nearly impossible with the MANA-ONE still dark.

dialogues.speaker: INT MANA ONE
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON - MAC - as finishes a re-patch and, with an exha POWERS IT UP. FLIP - FLIP - FLIP... Before he throws the final switch he takes a ceremonial ‘good luck’ sip of the tequila, puts the bottle down and then.... FLIP... No explosion... No boom.... Just a SERIES of GREEN LIGHTS COMING ON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
