dialogues.text: All the power comes back on in the abandoned DCC. We watc as the INTERNAL PRESSURE GAUGES return to NORMAL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: External lights go on. Zhang smiles at Meiying. Good news

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas and Suyin watch as the MANA-ONE blossoms to life. I like being at the foot of the Eifel tower at night. And thanks to the light they can now see the SUBMERSIBLE THE BOT - high above them - but making progress.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: RSV in sight... But his voice TRAILS OFF because suddenly the SUB and the vanishes in A SHADOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PFFFFFT! - STATIC replaces the picture from submersible’s nose cam. The RSV stops responding to controls...

dialogues.speaker: FAN
dialogues.text: What the...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gradually, the shadow clears... And suddenly Jonas and Su are looking at THE BOT -- no longer tethered to anything dropping like a ROCK -- right down on top of them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JONAS pushes SUYIN to cover behind rocky coral as -- SMAS THE BOT slams into the sea-floor, sending debris flying. For a minute, we can’t see anything through the all the S that’s been kicked up by impact.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Jonas, come in! Jonas, Suyin! Then the SAND clears. Jonas and Suyin are okay. But their plan literally lies in tatters all around their feet.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Fan, this is the moment you tell me Dimitri made two of those things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan stares at her controls, still trying to re-establish contact with the machine. DJ puts his hand on her shoulde

dialogues.speaker: DJ, (MIC)
dialogues.text: That's a negative, Jonas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mac, who has joined Zhang and Meiying, looks at Zhang.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: (in disbelief) There has to be another way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas has another way. He exhales.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Okay, then. DJ and Fan get to the Zodiac. As soon as Suyin surfaces, you load up and get as far away from here as you can.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: What are you doing? Jonas shows her the hand flares.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Back-up plan. I use these to lure it to the O-level, we know how much it likes smashing that place up.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: That’s a suicide mission.  110.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Not necessarily. It is, however, a solo mission so... Dr. Zhang, you're clear to bring Suyin up...

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ and Fan have joined Mac, Zhang, and Meiying.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Dr. Zhang, I repeat, bring Suyin up...

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Jonas, let’s think a moment--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Dammit, it’s this or we all lose. Now bring your daughter back to her daughter, am I clear?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suyin shakes her head.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: No, we're in this together... She reaches out with a tether hook - hoping to connect Jonas’s suit to hers but just before she can... She is pulled away. She’s being pulled up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mac has thrown the lever himself.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: I’m cutting loose!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She can still see Jonas - he looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Please don’t. The distance between them growing... The flickering light the Mana-One revealing the sadness in Suyin’s eyes... Then she disappears into the haze.  111.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas approaches an emergency airlock at the base. He touches the keypad. It lights up.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Mac. I forgot to say - great job with the power. Not that I ever doubted you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mac smiles at the joke. Behind him, the group cautiously boards the lone Zodiac tied to what’s left of the dock.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Okay, maybe I did...

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (MIC)
dialogues.text: So, a back-up plan, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas, free from his suit, climbs a seemingly endless lad backpack still on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas emerges from a hatch on the backside of the Elevato shaft. He walks around so he can see ALL THREE REMAINING SPOKES - AND THE RIM THAT IS ATTACHED TO THEM ALL.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: You just be ready to get out of here when I tell you. He presses the elevator button. Waits and then - ding. It arrives. He steps inside, presses the button for the surface, then WEDGES the door so it doesn’t go anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: THEN JONAS TURNS AND WALKS DOWN THE CENTER SPOKE
dialogues.text: He’s heading towards the rim, appreciating the magnificen structure this used to be.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Dr. Zhang, I don’t know what kind of security deposit you put down on this place, but I don’t think you're getting it back.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Whatever it takes, Jonas....  112.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FAN unties the bow, ZHANG the stern. Everyone is on board including -- SUYIN, who surprises Jonas when she chimes i

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Just make sure you get back up here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas, pleased Suyin has said this. Happy to hear her voi

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Okay... Thirty seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ZODIAC’s engine roars to life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The noise of the ZODIAC is more of a low vibration down here... One the MEG turns towards... It begins its ascent but then... TWINKLING RED-LIGHTS catch its attention. It’s Jonas... In the O-Level...

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (V.O - RADIO)
dialogues.text: Twenty seconds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas has struck the two flares and he’s waving them in h hands... Waiting... Hoping to see the MEG coming for him.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: Come on... Come on... The MEG turns -- and comes straight towards him. JONAS ho his ground... And holds it... And holds it... Then--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: Ten seconds. Go! Jonas tosses the flares so that they will land close to t backpack. As they arc high in the air, he turns and sprin FOR THE ELEVATOR...  113.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ZODIAC puts some distance between itself and the stat

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Five seconds... Four...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jonas runs into the Elevator and pulls out the wedge. The doors close, and the ELEVATOR QUICKLY BEGINS TO RISE.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS, (MIC)
dialogues.text: (smiling) ...Three... two... THAT’S WHEN ALL THE POWER GOES OUT - INCLUDING THE POWER THE ELEVATOR - BRINGING EVERYTHING TO A GRINDING HALT. So _ much for his escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The passengers see the station power down. Grim reality s in. They know that can’t be good for his plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a moment Jonas just sits there in the darkness. Then sees something. Gum. He stakes a stick as he finishes the countdown--

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: --One.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMASH. The glass of the center spoke gives way to the pow of the MEG. And the MEG plows right into the backpack.

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: An explosive force of more than a 1000 sticks of dynamite released.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MEG dies in three stages that play out in less than 1/100th of a second. First, the BLAST WAVE liquefies the cartilage that makes up its body, essentially turning int giant shark-suited goo. Then, the HEAT super cooks the sk into a black charcoal. Finally, the glass shards pierce t carcass, VAPORIZING it into a cloud of tissue and blood t leaves no mistake - THE MEG IS NO MORE.  114.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The explosion, moving faster than sound, hits the elevato BEFORE the sound does. So for a dizzying moment, the elevator is rocketed skyward, a bullet in a silent barrel

dialogues.speaker: THEN COMES THE DEAFENING ROAR
dialogues.text: A JET OF FIRE - shoots through the seams of the rapidly rising rocket lift. Suddenly Jonas thinks it’s walls are made of flame. Then FLAMES obscure our view of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the Zodiac, the Mana-One looks like a volcano. JETS FIRE erupt randomly from the station, followed by a DEAFE BLAST that causes the team to duck and cover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still shooting towards the surface, flames swirling. Then when the pressure has reached its crescendo, THE ELEVATOR ITSELF DISINTEGRATES, and, like a cocoon that’s revealed cargo, it releases Jonas into the OCEAN. Floating in and out of consciousness, rising towards the light, the last thing JONAS sees is a hazy image of THE B HUMPBACK WHALE. It’s safe. Then he passes out and we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Zodiac navigates the seas around what’s left of the M One. They’ve been searching for ten minutes with no sign. Expressions are grave. It’s Suyin who sees him.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: There! JONAS is lying, half in the water, half clinging to a floating remnant of the Mana-One. But he’s not moving. Th crew agonizes, waiting for a sign... They get it when Jon without raising his head, lifts a weary arm skyward and g them a THUMBS UP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A reverent crowd sits, listening to the end of a MEMORIAL SERVICE/CELEBRATION OF LIFE. SUYIN stands at a dais, in  115. front of the MEMORIAL ITSELF, a beautiful, white marble, standing wall that is shaped like a WAVE. On the wall, etched tastefully, as if they were part of the wave, are names and histories of Junjie, Carl, Luc, Francois, Helle and Dimitri. SUYIN, stunningly beautiful in her formal dress, turns to final page of her dedication speech.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: (at the dais) Advancing our understanding of life has always required great sacrifice. The world doesn’t give up her secrets easily...

dialogues.speaker: OFF TO THE SIDE
dialogues.text: JONAS, dashing in a suit. MAC, a little less so in his. F and DJ both looking cooler than everyone else in the plac ZHANG watches Suyin with great admiration.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: (quietly to Jonas) She’s her father’s daughter all right.

dialogues.speaker: SUYIN
dialogues.text: (at the dais) My father’s dream, a dream shared by those we honor today, is that we come to appreciate the gift that is our oceans. Now, thanks to their efforts, the entire world knows that there is more to this gift than we dared imagine. And I see, in everyone’s eyes, the same excitement I once saw exclusively in my father’s. That is how I know the friends we lost will live forever. (it hangs there) Thank you all very much. Off the applause we CUT TO...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People milling about, congratulating Suyin who is with Zh Meiying, Jonas, and Mac. A passing waiter offers some cra cakes... Jonas shakes his head...

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: He’s allergic.  116. Mac takes a beat.

dialogues.speaker: MAC
dialogues.text: You are? Is that ironic? (as they laugh) And since when does Meiying know stuff about you that I don’t... Mac's voice trails off as he realizes Jonas and Suyin are TOGETHER.

dialogues.speaker: MAC, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh, uh, never mind--

dialogues.speaker: MEIYING
dialogues.text: Try to keep up, Mac. That gets laughs. Mac is in the middle of a comeback when US and a CHINESE NAVAL OFFICER interrupt the festivities.

dialogues.speaker: CHINESE OFFICER
dialogues.text: Excuse me, Dr. Zhang, we have a situation and we’d like to talk to you.

dialogues.speaker: ZHANG
dialogues.text: This is a service for my friends, now is not--

dialogues.speaker: US OFFICER
dialogues.text: --A deep-sea drilling platform tore open a dormant volcano this morning. It’s created a hole in the thermocline.

dialogues.speaker: JONAS
dialogues.text: How big a hole?

dialogues.speaker: CHINESE OFFICER
dialogues.text: (long beat) It’s the size of Manhattan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch as an animated conversation ensues, and then all them hurry out through the crowd, pausing to grab FAN and and then disappearing from our view behind the wave wall.
